original: Dīgha Nikāya 16
analyzed: dīgha nikāya

original: Mahāparinibbānasutta
analyzed: mahāparinibbānasutta

original: Evaṁ me sutaṁ—
analyzed: evam me suta

original: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā rājagahe viharati gijjhakūṭe pabbate.
analyzed: ekam samayam bhagavā rājagahe viharati gijjhakūṭe pabbate

original: Tena kho pana samayena rājā māgadho ajātasattu vedehiputto vajjī abhiyātukāmo hoti.
analyzed: tena khalu pana samayena rājā māgadhaḥ ajātasattu vedehiputto vajjī abhiyātu kāmaḥ hoti

original: So evamāha:
analyzed: sā u evam āha

original: “ahaṁ hime vajjī evaṁmahiddhike evaṁmahānubhāve ucchecchāmi vajjī, vināsessāmi vajjī, anayabyasanaṁ āpādessāmī”ti.
analyzed: aham hime vajjī eva mahiddhike eva mahā anubhāve ucchecchāmi vajjī vināsessāmi vajjī anaya byasanam āpādessāmi iti

original: Atha kho rājā māgadho ajātasattu vedehiputto vassakāraṁ brāhmaṇaṁ magadhamahāmattaṁ āmantesi:
analyzed: atha khalu rājā māgadhaḥ ajātasattu vedehiputtaḥ vassakāram brāhmaṇam magadha mahāmattam āmantesi

original: “ehi tvaṁ, brāhmaṇa, yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkama; upasaṅkamitvā mama vacanena bhagavato pāde sirasā vandāhi, appābādhaṁ appātaṅkaṁ lahuṭṭhānaṁ balaṁ phāsuvihāraṁ puccha:
analyzed: ehi tva brāhmaṇa yena bhagavā tena upasaṅkama upasaṅkamitvā mama vacanena bhagavato pāde sirasā vandāhi appa ābādham appa ātaṅkam lahu ṭṭhānam balam phāsu vihāram puccha

original: ‘rājā, bhante, māgadho ajātasattu vedehiputto bhagavato pāde sirasā vandati, appābādhaṁ appātaṅkaṁ lahuṭṭhānaṁ balaṁ phāsuvihāraṁ pucchatī’ti.
analyzed: rājā bhante māgadhaḥ ajātasattu vedehiputto bhagavato pāde sirasā vandati appa ābādham appa ātaṅkam lahu ṭṭhānam balam phāsu vihāram pucchati iti

original: Evañca vadehi:
analyzed: evañca vadehi

original: ‘rājā, bhante, māgadho ajātasattu vedehiputto vajjī abhiyātukāmo.
analyzed: rājā bhante māgadhaḥ ajātasattu vedehiputtaḥ vajjī abhiyātu kāmaḥ

original: So evamāha:
analyzed: sā u evam āha

original: “ahaṁ hime vajjī evaṁmahiddhike evaṁmahānubhāve ucchecchāmi vajjī, vināsessāmi vajjī, anayabyasanaṁ āpādessāmī”’ti.
analyzed: aham hime vajjī eva mahiddhike eva mahā anubhāve ucchecchāmi vajjī vināsessāmi vajjī anaya byasanam āpādessāmi iti

original: Yathā te bhagavā byākaroti, taṁ sādhukaṁ uggahetvā mama āroceyyāsi.
analyzed: yathā te bhagavā byākaroti tam sādhukam uggahetvā mama āroceyyāsi

original: Na hi tathāgatā vitathaṁ bhaṇantī”ti.
analyzed: na hi tathāgatāḥ vitatham bhaṇanti iti

original: 1. Vassakārabrāhmaṇa
analyzed: vassakārabrāhmaṇa

original: “Evaṁ, bho”ti kho vassakāro brāhmaṇo magadhamahāmatto rañño māgadhassa ajātasattussa
analyzed: eva bhoti kho vassakāraḥ brāhmaṇaḥ magadha mahāmattaḥ raññaḥ māgadhassa ajātasattussa

original: vedehiputtassa paṭissutvā bhaddāni bhaddāni yānāni yojetvā bhaddaṁ bhaddaṁ yānaṁ
analyzed: vedehiputtassa paṭissutvā bhaddāni bhaddāni yānāni yojetvā bhaddam bhaddam yāna

original: abhiruhitvā bhaddehi bhaddehi yānehi rājagahamhā niyyāsi, yena gijjhakūṭo pabbato tena pāyāsi.
analyzed: abhiruhitvā bhaddehi bhaddehi yānehi rājagahamhā niyyāsi yena gijjhakūṭaḥ pabbato tena pāyāsi

original: Yāvatikā yānassa bhūmi, yānena gantvā, yānā paccorohitvā pattikova yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavatā saddhiṁ sammodi.
analyzed: yāvatikā yānassa bhūmi yānena gantvā yānā paccorohitvā pattikā uva yena bhagavā tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā bhagavatā saddhim sammodi

original: Sammodanīyaṁ kathaṁ sāraṇīyaṁ vītisāretvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi. Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho vassakāro brāhmaṇo magadhamahāmatto bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: sammodanīyam katham sāraṇīyam vītisāretvā ekamantam nisīdi ekamantam nisinnaḥ kho vassakāraḥ brāhmaṇaḥ magadha mahāmattaḥ bhagavantam etat avoca

original: “rājā, bho gotama, māgadho ajātasattu vedehiputto bhoto gotamassa pāde sirasā vandati, appābādhaṁ appātaṅkaṁ lahuṭṭhānaṁ balaṁ phāsuvihāraṁ pucchati.
analyzed: rājā bho gotama māgadhaḥ ajātasattu vedehiputto bhotaḥ gotamassa pāde sirasā vandati appa ābādham appa ātaṅkam lahu ṭṭhānam balam phāsu vihāram pucchati

original: Rājā, bho gotama, māgadho ajātasattu vedehiputto vajjī abhiyātukāmo.
analyzed: rājā bho gotama māgadhaḥ ajātasattu vedehiputtaḥ vajjī abhiyātu kāmaḥ

original: So evamāha:
analyzed: sā u evam āha

original: ‘ahaṁ hime vajjī evaṁmahiddhike evaṁmahānubhāve ucchecchāmi vajjī, vināsessāmi vajjī, anayabyasanaṁ āpādessāmī’”ti.
analyzed: aham hime vajjī eva mahiddhike eva mahā anubhāve ucchecchāmi vajjī vināsessāmi vajjī anaya byasanam āpādessāmi iti

original: 2. Rājaaparihāniyadhamma
analyzed: rāja a parihāniya dhamma

original: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā ānando bhagavato piṭṭhito ṭhito hoti bhagavantaṁ bījayamāno.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena āyasmai ānandaḥ bhagavataḥ piṭṭhitaḥ ṭhitaḥ hoti bhagavantam bījayamāno

original: Atha kho bhagavā āyasmantaṁ ānandaṁ āmantesi:
analyzed: atha khalu bhagavān āyasmantam ānandam āmantesi

original: “kinti te, ānanda, sutaṁ, ‘vajjī abhiṇhaṁ sannipātā sannipātabahulā’”ti?
analyzed: kinti te ānanda suta vajjī sannipātā sannipāta bahulā ati

original: “Sutaṁ metaṁ, bhante: ‘vajjī abhiṇhaṁ sannipātā sannipātabahulā’”ti.
analyzed: sutam mā ita bhante vajjī abhiṇham sannipātā sannipāta bahulā ati

original: “Yāvakīvañca, ānanda, vajjī abhiṇhaṁ sannipātā sannipātabahulā bhavissanti, vuddhiyeva, ānanda, vajjīnaṁ pāṭikaṅkhā, no parihāni.
analyzed: ānanda vajjī abhiṇham sannipātā sannipāta bahulāḥ bhavissanti vuddhiyā iva ānanda vajjīnam pāṭikaṅkhā no

original: Kinti te, ānanda, sutaṁ, ‘vajjī samaggā sannipatanti, samaggā vuṭṭhahanti, samaggā vajjikaraṇīyāni karontī’”ti?
analyzed: kinti te ānanda suta vajjī samaggā sannipatanti samaggāḥ vuṭṭhahanti samaggāḥ vajji karaṇīyāni karonti iti

original: “Sutaṁ metaṁ, bhante: ‘vajjī samaggā sannipatanti, samaggā vuṭṭhahanti, samaggā vajjikaraṇīyāni karontī’”ti.
analyzed: sutam mā ita bhante vajjī samaggā sannipatanti samaggāḥ vuṭṭhahanti samaggāḥ vajji karaṇīyāni karonti iti

original: “Yāvakīvañca, ānanda, vajjī samaggā sannipatissanti, samaggā vuṭṭhahissanti, samaggā vajjikaraṇīyāni karissanti, vuddhiyeva, ānanda, vajjīnaṁ pāṭikaṅkhā, no parihāni.
analyzed: ānanda vajjī samaggā sannipatissanti samaggāḥ vuṭṭhahissanti samaggāḥ vajji karaṇīyāni karissanti vuddhiyā iva ānanda vajjīnam pāṭikaṅkhā no parihāni

original: Kinti te, ānanda, sutaṁ, ‘vajjī apaññattaṁ na paññapenti, paññattaṁ na samucchindanti, yathāpaññatte porāṇe vajjidhamme samādāya vattantī’”ti?
analyzed: kinti te ānanda suta vajjī a paññattam na paññapenti paññattam na samucchindanti yathā paññatte porāṇe vajji dhamme samādāya vattanti iti

original: “Sutaṁ metaṁ, bhante: ‘vajjī apaññattaṁ na paññapenti, paññattaṁ na samucchindanti, yathāpaññatte porāṇe vajjidhamme samādāya vattantī’”ti.
analyzed: sutam mā ita bhante vajjī a paññattam na paññapenti paññattam na samucchindanti yathā paññatte porāṇe vajji dhamme samādāya vattanti iti

original: “Yāvakīvañca, ānanda, vajjī apaññattaṁ na paññapessanti, paññattaṁ na samucchindissanti,
analyzed: yāvakīvañcaḥ ānanda vajjī a paññattam na paññapessanti paññattam na samucchindissanti

original: yathāpaññatte porāṇe vajjidhamme samādāya vattissanti, vuddhiyeva, ānanda, vajjīnaṁ
analyzed: yathā paññatte porāṇe vajji dhamme samādāya vattissanti ānanda

original: pāṭikaṅkhā, no parihāni.
analyzed: pāṭikaṅkhā no

original: Kinti te, ānanda, sutaṁ, ‘vajjī ye te vajjīnaṁ vajjimahallakā, te sakkaronti garuṁ karonti mānenti pūjenti, tesañca sotabbaṁ maññantī’”ti?
analyzed: kinti te ānanda suta vajjī ye te vajjīnam vajji mahallakā te sakkaronti garum karonti mānenti pūjenti tesam ca sotabbam maññanti iti

original: “Sutaṁ metaṁ, bhante: ‘vajjī ye te vajjīnaṁ vajjimahallakā, te sakkaronti garuṁ karonti mānenti pūjenti, tesañca sotabbaṁ maññantī’”ti.
analyzed: sutam mā ita bhante vajjī ye te vajjīnam vajji mahallakā te sakkaronti garum karonti mānenti pūjenti tesam ca sotabbam maññanti iti

original: “Yāvakīvañca, ānanda, vajjī ye te vajjīnaṁ vajjimahallakā, te sakkarissanti garuṁ
analyzed: ānanda vajjī ye te vajjīnam vajji mahallakā te sakkarissanti garu

original: karissanti mānessanti pūjessanti, tesañca sotabbaṁ maññissanti, vuddhiyeva, ānanda,
analyzed: karissanti mānessanti pūjessanti tesam ca sotabbam maññissanti vuddhiyā iva ānanda

original: vajjīnaṁ pāṭikaṅkhā, no parihāni.
analyzed: vajjīnam pāṭikaṅkhā no parihāni

original: Kinti te, ānanda, sutaṁ, ‘vajjī yā tā kulitthiyo kulakumāriyo, tā na okkassa pasayha vāsentī’”ti?
analyzed: kinti te ānanda suta vajjī yā tā kulitthiyaḥ kula kumāriyaḥ tā naḥ okkassa pasayha vāsenti iti

original: “Sutaṁ metaṁ, bhante: ‘vajjī yā tā kulitthiyo kulakumāriyo tā na okkassa pasayha vāsentī’”ti.
analyzed: sutam mā ita bhante vajjī yā tā kulitthiyaḥ kula kumāriyaḥ tā naḥ okkassa pasayha vāsenti iti

original: “Yāvakīvañca, ānanda, vajjī yā tā kulitthiyo kulakumāriyo, tā na okkassa pasayha vāsessanti, vuddhiyeva, ānanda, vajjīnaṁ pāṭikaṅkhā, no parihāni.
analyzed: ānanda vajjī yā tā kulitthiyaḥ kula kumāriyaḥ tāḥ naḥ okkassa pasayha vāsessanti ānanda vajjīnam pāṭikaṅkhā no parihāni

original: Kinti te, ānanda, sutaṁ, ‘vajjī yāni tāni vajjīnaṁ vajjicetiyāni abbhantarāni ceva
analyzed: kinti te ānanda suta vajjī yāni tāni vajjīnam vajji cetiyāni abbhantarāni ca iva

original: bāhirāni ca, tāni sakkaronti garuṁ karonti mānenti pūjenti, tesañca dinnapubbaṁ katapubbaṁ
analyzed: bāhirāni ca tāni sakkaronti garum karonti mānenti pūjenti tesam ca dinna pubbam kata pubba

original: dhammikaṁ baliṁ no parihāpentī’”ti?
analyzed: dhammikam balim no parihāpenti iti

original: “Sutaṁ metaṁ, bhante: ‘vajjī yāni tāni vajjīnaṁ vajjicetiyāni abbhantarāni ceva bāhirāni
analyzed: sutam mā ita bhante vajjī yāni tāni vajjīnam vajji cetiyāni abbhantarāni ca iva bāhirāni

original: ca, tāni sakkaronti garuṁ karonti mānenti pūjenti tesañca dinnapubbaṁ katapubbaṁ
analyzed: ca tāni sakkaronti garum karonti mānenti pūjenti tesam ca dinna pubbam kata pubba

original: dhammikaṁ baliṁ no parihāpentī’”ti.
analyzed: dhammikam balim no parihāpenti iti

original: “Yāvakīvañca, ānanda, vajjī yāni tāni vajjīnaṁ vajjicetiyāni abbhantarāni ceva bāhirāni
analyzed: ānanda vajjī yāni tāni vajjīnam vajji cetiyāni abbhantarāni ca iva bāhirāni

original: ca, tāni sakkarissanti garuṁ karissanti mānessanti pūjessanti, tesañca dinnapubbaṁ
analyzed: ca tāni sakkarissanti garum karissanti mānessanti pūjessanti tesam ca dinna pubba

original: katapubbaṁ dhammikaṁ baliṁ no parihāpessanti, vuddhiyeva, ānanda, vajjīnaṁ pāṭikaṅkhā, no parihāni.
analyzed: kata pubbam dhammikam balim no parihāpessanti vuddhiyā iva ānanda vajjīnam pāṭikaṅkhā no parihāni

original: Kinti te, ānanda, sutaṁ, ‘vajjīnaṁ arahantesu dhammikā rakkhāvaraṇagutti susaṁvihitā, kinti anāgatā ca arahanto vijitaṁ āgaccheyyuṁ, āgatā ca arahanto vijite phāsu vihareyyun’”ti?
analyzed: kinti te ānanda suta arahantesu dhammikā rakkhā āvaraṇa gutti su sa vihitā kinti anāgatā ca arahantaḥ vijitam āgaccheyyu āgatā ca arahantaḥ vijite phāsu vihareyyunti

original: “Sutaṁ metaṁ, bhante ‘vajjīnaṁ arahantesu dhammikā rakkhāvaraṇagutti susaṁvihitā kinti anāgatā ca arahanto vijitaṁ āgaccheyyuṁ, āgatā ca arahanto vijite phāsu vihareyyun’”ti.
analyzed: sutam mā ita bhante arahantesu dhammikā rakkhā āvaraṇa gutti su sa vihitā kinti anāgatā ca arahantaḥ vijitam āgaccheyyu āgatā ca arahantaḥ vijite phāsu vihareyyunti

original: “Yāvakīvañca, ānanda, vajjīnaṁ arahantesu dhammikā rakkhāvaraṇagutti susaṁvihitā
analyzed: ānanda arahantesu dhammikā rakkhā āvaraṇa gutti su sa vihitā

original: bhavissati, kinti anāgatā ca arahanto vijitaṁ āgaccheyyuṁ, āgatā ca arahanto vijite
analyzed: bhavissati kinti anāgatā ca arahantaḥ vijitam āgaccheyyu āgatā ca arahantaḥ vijite

original: phāsu vihareyyunti. Vuddhiyeva, ānanda, vajjīnaṁ pāṭikaṅkhā, no parihānī”ti.
analyzed: phāsu vihareyyunti ānanda vajjīnam pāṭikaṅkhā no parihāni iti

original: Atha kho bhagavā vassakāraṁ brāhmaṇaṁ magadhamahāmattaṁ āmantesi:
analyzed: atha khalu bhagavā vassakāram brāhmaṇam magadha mahāmattam āmantesi

original: “ekamidāhaṁ, brāhmaṇa, samayaṁ vesāliyaṁ viharāmi sārandade cetiye.
analyzed: ekam id āha brāhmaṇa samayam vesāliyam viharāmi sārandade cetiye

original: Tatrāhaṁ vajjīnaṁ ime satta aparihāniye dhamme desesiṁ.
analyzed: tatra aham vajjīnam ime satta aparihāniye dhamme desesi

original: Yāvakīvañca, brāhmaṇa, ime satta aparihāniyā dhammā vajjīsu ṭhassanti, imesu ca sattasu
analyzed: brāhmaṇa ime satta aparihāniyāḥ dhammāḥ vajjīsu imesu ca sattasu

original: aparihāniyesu dhammesu vajjī sandississanti, vuddhiyeva, brāhmaṇa, vajjīnaṁ pāṭikaṅkhā, no parihānī”ti.
analyzed: a parihāniyesu dhammesu vajjī sandississanti vuddhiyā iva brāhmaṇa vajjīnam pāṭikaṅkhā no parihāni iti

original: Evaṁ vutte, vassakāro brāhmaṇo magadhamahāmatto bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: evam vutte vassakāraḥ brāhmaṇaḥ magadha mahāmattaḥ bhagavantam etat avoca

original: “ekamekenapi, bho gotama, aparihāniyena dhammena samannāgatānaṁ vajjīnaṁ vuddhiyeva pāṭikaṅkhā, no parihāni.
analyzed: ekam ekena api bho gotama a parihāniyena dhammena samannāgatānam vajjīnam vuddhiyā iva pāṭikaṅkhā no parihāni

original: Ko pana vādo sattahi aparihāniyehi dhammehi.
analyzed: kaḥ pana vādaḥ sattahi a parihāniyehi dhammehi

original: Akaraṇīyāva, bho gotama, vajjī raññā māgadhena ajātasattunā vedehiputtena yadidaṁ yuddhassa, aññatra upalāpanāya aññatra mithubhedā.
analyzed: a karaṇīyā ava bho gotama vajjī raññā māgadhena ajātasattunā vedehiputtena yat idam yuddhassa aññatra upalāpanāya aññatra mithu bhedā

original: Handa ca dāni mayaṁ, bho gotama, gacchāma, bahukiccā mayaṁ bahukaraṇīyā”ti.
analyzed: handa ca dāni maya bho gotama gacchāma bahu kiccā mayam bahu karaṇīyā ati

original: “Yassadāni tvaṁ, brāhmaṇa, kālaṁ maññasī”ti.
analyzed: yaḥ sadāni tva brāhmaṇa kālam maññasi iti

original: Atha kho vassakāro brāhmaṇo magadhamahāmatto bhagavato bhāsitaṁ abhinanditvā anumoditvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkāmi.
analyzed: atha kho vassakāraḥ brāhmaṇaḥ magadha mahāmattaḥ bhagavataḥ bhāsitam abhinanditvā anumoditvā uṭṭhāya āsanā pakkāmi

original: 3. Bhikkhuaparihāniyadhamma
analyzed: bhikkhu a parihāniya dhamma

original: Atha kho bhagavā acirapakkante vassakāre brāhmaṇe magadhamahāmatte āyasmantaṁ ānandaṁ āmantesi:
analyzed: atha khalu bhagavā acira pakkante vassakāre brāhmaṇe magadha mahāmatte āyasmantam ānandam āmantesi

original: “gaccha tvaṁ, ānanda, yāvatikā bhikkhū rājagahaṁ upanissāya viharanti, te sabbe upaṭṭhānasālāyaṁ sannipātehī”ti.
analyzed: gaccha tvaṃ ānanda yāvatikāḥ bhikkhū rājagaham upanissāya viharanti te sabbe upaṭṭhāna sālāyam sannipātehi iti

original: “Evaṁ, bhante”ti kho āyasmā ānando bhagavato paṭissutvā yāvatikā bhikkhū rājagahaṁ
analyzed: eva bhante iti kho āyasman ānandaḥ bhagavataḥ paṭissutvā yāvatikāḥ bhikkhū rājagaha

original: upanissāya viharanti, te sabbe upaṭṭhānasālāyaṁ sannipātetvā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
analyzed: upanissāya viharanti te sabbe upaṭṭhāna sālāyam sannipātetvā yena bhagavā tena upasaṅkami

original: upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ aṭṭhāsi. Ekamantaṁ ṭhito kho āyasmā
analyzed: upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantam abhivādetvā ekamantam aṭṭhāsi ekamantam ṭhitaḥ kho āyasmā

original: ānando bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: ānandaḥ bhagavantam etat avoca

original: “sannipatito, bhante, bhikkhusaṅgho, yassadāni, bhante, bhagavā kālaṁ maññatī”ti.
analyzed: sannipatitaḥ bhante bhikkhu saṅghaḥ yassadāni bhante bhagavā kālam maññati iti

original: Atha kho bhagavā uṭṭhāyāsanā yena upaṭṭhānasālā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā paññatte āsane nisīdi.
analyzed: atha kho bhagavā uṭṭhāya āsanā yena upaṭṭhāna sālā tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā paññatte āsane nisīdi

original: Nisajja kho bhagavā bhikkhū āmantesi:

original: “āyāmānanda, yena ambalaṭṭhikā tenupasaṅkamissāmā”ti.
analyzed: āyāma ānanda yena ambalaṭṭhikā tena upasaṅkamissāma ati

original: “Evaṁ, bhante”ti kho āyasmā ānando bhagavato paccassosi.
analyzed: eva bhante iti kho āyasmai ānandaḥ bhagavataḥ paccassosi

original: Atha kho bhagavā mahatā bhikkhusaṅghena saddhiṁ yena ambalaṭṭhikā tadavasari.
analyzed: atha kho bhagavā mahatā bhikkhu saṅghena saddhim yena ambalaṭṭhikā tat avasari

original: Tatra sudaṁ bhagavā ambalaṭṭhikāyaṁ viharati rājāgārake.

original: “iti sīlaṁ iti samādhi iti paññā.

original: kāmāsavā, bhavāsavā, avijjāsavā”ti.

original: “Evaṁ, bhante”ti kho āyasmā ānando bhagavato paccassosi.
analyzed: eva bhante iti kho āyasmai ānandaḥ bhagavataḥ paccassosi

original: Atha kho bhagavā mahatā bhikkhusaṅghena saddhiṁ yena nāḷandā tadavasari,
analyzed: atha kho bhagavā mahatā bhikkhu saṅghena saddhim yena nāḷandā tat avasari

original: 4. Sāriputtasīhanāda
analyzed: sāriputta sīhanāda

original: Atha kho āyasmā sāriputto yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi. Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho āyasmā sāriputto bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: atha khalu āyasmā sāriputtaḥ yena bhagavā tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantam abhivādetvā ekamantam nisīdi ekamantam nisinnaḥ khalu āyasmā sāriputtaḥ bhagavantam etat avoca

original: “evaṁ pasanno ahaṁ, bhante, bhagavati;
analyzed: evam pasannaḥ aha bhante bhagavati

original: na cāhu na ca bhavissati na cetarahi vijjati añño samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā bhagavatā bhiyyobhiññataro yadidaṁ sambodhiyan”ti.
analyzed: na ca āhu na ca bhavissati na ca itarahi vijjati aññaḥ samaṇaḥ vā brāhmaṇaḥ vā bhagavatā bhiyyobhiññataraḥ yat idam sambodhiyanti

original: “Uḷārā kho te ayaṁ, sāriputta, āsabhī vācā bhāsitā, ekaṁso gahito, sīhanādo nadito:

original: ‘evaṁpasanno ahaṁ, bhante, bhagavati;
analyzed: eva apasannaḥ aha bhante bhagavati

original: na cāhu na ca bhavissati na cetarahi vijjati añño samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā bhagavatā bhiyyobhiññataro yadidaṁ sambodhiyan’ti.
analyzed: na ca āhu na ca bhavissati na ca itarahi vijjati aññaḥ samaṇaḥ vā brāhmaṇaḥ vā bhagavatā bhiyyobhiññataraḥ yat idam sambodhiyanti

original: Kiṁ te, sāriputta, ye te ahesuṁ atītamaddhānaṁ arahanto sammāsambuddhā, sabbe te bhagavanto cetasā ceto paricca viditā:

original: ‘evaṁsīlā te bhagavanto ahesuṁ itipi, evaṁdhammā evaṁpaññā evaṁvihārī evaṁvimuttā te bhagavanto ahesuṁ itipī’”ti?
analyzed: eva sīlā te bhagavantaḥ ahesuṃ iti pi eva dhammā eva paññā eva vihārī eva vimuttā te bhagavantaḥ ahesuṃ iti pi iti

original: “No hetaṁ, bhante”.
analyzed: naḥ heta bhante

original: “Kiṁ pana te, sāriputta, ye te bhavissanti anāgatamaddhānaṁ arahanto sammāsambuddhā, sabbe te bhagavanto cetasā ceto paricca viditā:

original: ‘evaṁsīlā te bhagavanto bhavissanti itipi, evaṁdhammā evaṁpaññā evaṁvihārī evaṁvimuttā te bhagavanto bhavissanti itipī’”ti?
analyzed: eva sīlā te bhagavantaḥ bhavissanti iti pi eva dhammāḥ eva paññāḥ eva vihārī eva vimuttā te bhagavantaḥ bhavissanti iti pi iti

original: “No hetaṁ, bhante”.
analyzed: naḥ heta bhante

original: “Kiṁ pana te, sāriputta, ahaṁ etarahi arahaṁ sammāsambuddho cetasā ceto paricca vidito:

original: ‘evaṁsīlo bhagavā itipi, evaṁdhammo evaṁpañño evaṁvihārī evaṁvimutto bhagavā itipī’”ti?

original: “No hetaṁ, bhante”.
analyzed: naḥ heta bhante

original: “Ettha ca hi te, sāriputta, atītānāgatapaccuppannesu arahantesu sammāsambuddhesu cetopariyañāṇaṁ natthi.

original: Atha kiñcarahi te ayaṁ, sāriputta, uḷārā āsabhī vācā bhāsitā, ekaṁso gahito, sīhanādo nadito:

original: ‘evaṁpasanno ahaṁ, bhante, bhagavati; na cāhu na ca bhavissati na cetarahi vijjati añño samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā bhagavatā bhiyyobhiññataro yadidaṁ sambodhiyan’”ti?
analyzed: eva pasannaḥ aha bhante bhagavati na ca āhu na ca bhavissati na ca itarahi vijjati aññaḥ samaṇaḥ vā brāhmaṇaḥ vā bhagavatā bhiyyobhiññataraḥ yat idam sambodhiyanti

original: “Na kho me, bhante, atītānāgatapaccuppannesu arahantesu sammāsambuddhesu cetopariyañāṇaṁ atthi,

original: api ca me dhammanvayo vidito.
analyzed: api ca me dhamma anvayaḥ viditaḥ

original: Seyyathāpi, bhante, rañño paccantimaṁ nagaraṁ daḷhuddhāpaṁ daḷhapākāratoraṇaṁ ekadvāraṁ,

analyzed: bhante āvasatha āgāre āsanāni paññattāni udaka maṇikaḥ patiṭṭhāpito tela padīpaḥ āropito

original: Atha kho bhagavā pāṭaligāmike upāsake āmantesi:

original: “pañcime, gahapatayo, ādīnavā dussīlassa sīlavipattiyā.

original: Katame pañca?
analyzed: katame pañca

original: Idha, gahapatayo, dussīlo sīlavipanno pamādādhikaraṇaṁ mahatiṁ bhogajāniṁ nigacchati.

original: Ayaṁ paṭhamo ādīnavo dussīlassa sīlavipattiyā.

original: Ayaṁ dutiyo ādīnavo dussīlassa sīlavipattiyā.
analyzed: ayam dutiyaḥ ādīnavaḥ dussīlassa sīla vipattiyā

analyzed: puna capara gahapatayaḥ dussīlaḥ sīla vipannaḥ yaññat eva parisam upasaṅkamati yadi

original: khattiyaparisaṁ yadi brāhmaṇaparisaṁ yadi gahapatiparisaṁ yadi samaṇaparisaṁ—avisārado
analyzed: khattiya parisam yadi brāhmaṇa parisam yadi gahapati parisam yadi samaṇa parisa a visāra daḥ

original: upasaṅkamati maṅkubhūto.
analyzed: upasaṅkamati maṅku bhūtaḥ

analyzed: ayam tatiyaḥ ādīnavaḥ dussīlassa sīla vipattiyā

original: Puna caparaṁ, gahapatayo, dussīlo sīlavipanno sammūḷho kālaṁ karoti.

original: Dukkhasamudayassa, bhikkhave, ariyasaccassa ananubodhā appaṭivedhā evamidaṁ dīghamaddhānaṁ sandhāvitaṁ saṁsaritaṁ mamañceva tumhākañca.

original: Dukkhanirodhassa, bhikkhave, ariyasaccassa ananubodhā appaṭivedhā evamidaṁ dīghamaddhānaṁ sandhāvitaṁ saṁsaritaṁ mamañceva tumhākañca.
analyzed: dukkha nirodhassa bhikkhave ariya saccassa ananubodhā appaṭivedhā evam idam dīgham addhānam sandhāvitam sa saritam mamañca iva tumhākañca

original: Dukkhanirodhagāminiyā paṭipadāya, bhikkhave, ariyasaccassa ananubodhā appaṭivedhā evamidaṁ dīghamaddhānaṁ sandhāvitaṁ saṁsaritaṁ mamañceva tumhākañca.

analyzed: atha khalu āyasmai ānandaḥ yena bhagavā tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantam abhivādetvā ekamantam nisīdi ekamantam nisinnaḥ khalu āyasmai ānandaḥ bhagavantam etat avoca

analyzed: nandā nāma bhante bhikkhunī na atike kālaṅkatā tassā kā gati kaḥ abhisamparāyaḥ

analyzed: sudattaḥ nāma bhante upāsakaḥ na atike kālaṅkato tassa kā gati kaḥ abhisamparāyaḥ

original: Nandā, ānanda, bhikkhunī pañcannaṁ orambhāgiyānaṁ saṁyojanānaṁ parikkhayā opapātikā tattha parinibbāyinī anāvattidhammā tasmā lokā.

original: Sudatto, ānanda, upāsako tiṇṇaṁ saṁyojanānaṁ parikkhayā rāgadosamohānaṁ tanuttā sakadāgāmī sakideva imaṁ lokaṁ āgantvā dukkhassantaṁ karissati.

original: Sujātā, ānanda, upāsikā tiṇṇaṁ saṁyojanānaṁ parikkhayā sotāpannā avinipātadhammā niyatā sambodhiparāyaṇā.

original: Kukkuṭo, ānanda, upāsako pañcannaṁ orambhāgiyānaṁ saṁyojanānaṁ parikkhayā opapātiko tattha parinibbāyī anāvattidhammo tasmā lokā.
analyzed: kukkuṭaḥ ānanda upāsako pañcannam orambhāgiyānam sayojanānam parikkhayā opapātiko tattha parinibbāyī an āvatti dhammo tasmā lokā

original: subhaddo, ānanda, upāsako pañcannaṁ orambhāgiyānaṁ saṁyojanānaṁ parikkhayā opapātiko tattha parinibbāyī anāvattidhammo tasmā lokā.
analyzed: subhaddaḥ ānandaḥ upāsako pañcannam orambhāgiyānam sayojanānam parikkhayā opapātiko tattha parinibbāyī an āvatti dhammo tasmā lokā

original: Paropaññāsaṁ, ānanda, nātike upāsakā kālaṅkatā, pañcannaṁ orambhāgiyānaṁ saṁyojanānaṁ parikkhayā opapātikā tattha parinibbāyino anāvattidhammā tasmā lokā.

original: Sādhikā navuti, ānanda, nātike upāsakā kālaṅkatā tiṇṇaṁ saṁyojanānaṁ parikkhayā rāgadosamohānaṁ tanuttā sakadāgāmino sakideva imaṁ lokaṁ āgantvā dukkhassantaṁ karissanti.
analyzed: sādhikā navuti ānanda na atike upāsakā tiṇṇam sayojanānam parikkhayāḥ rāga dosa mohānam tanuttā sakadāgāmino sakideva imam lokam āgantvā dukkha ssantam karissanti

original: Sātirekāni, ānanda, pañcasatāni nātike upāsakā kālaṅkatā, tiṇṇaṁ saṁyojanānaṁ parikkhayā sotāpannā avinipātadhammā niyatā sambodhiparāyaṇā.
analyzed: sa atirekāni ānanda pañca satāni na atike upāsakā kālaṅkatā tiṇṇam sayojanānam parikkhayā sotāpannā a vinipāta dhammā niyatā sambodhi parāyaṇā

original: 10. Dhammādāsadhammapariyāya
analyzed: dhamma adāsa dhamma pariyāya

original: Anacchariyaṁ kho panetaṁ, ānanda, yaṁ manussabhūto kālaṁ kareyya.

original: Tasmiṁyeva kālaṅkate tathāgataṁ upasaṅkamitvā etamatthaṁ pucchissatha, vihesā hesā, ānanda, tathāgatassa.

original: Tasmātihānanda, dhammādāsaṁ nāma dhammapariyāyaṁ desessāmi, yena samannāgato ariyasāvako ākaṅkhamāno attanāva attānaṁ byākareyya:
analyzed: tasmā ati ha ānanda dhammādāsam nāma dhamma pariyāyam desessāmi yena samannāgataḥ ariya sāvakaḥ ākaṅkhamānaḥ attanā va attānam byākareyya

original: ‘khīṇanirayomhi khīṇatiracchānayoni khīṇapettivisayo khīṇāpāyaduggativinipāto, sotāpannohamasmi avinipātadhammo niyato sambodhiparāyaṇo’ti.
analyzed: khīṇa nirayaḥ mhi khīṇa tiracchāna yoni khīṇa petti visayaḥ khīṇa apāya duggati vinipāto so utāpannaḥ ham asmi a vinipāta dhammo niyataḥ sambodhi parāyaṇaḥ ti

original: Katamo ca so, ānanda, dhammādāso dhammapariyāyo, yena samannāgato ariyasāvako ākaṅkhamāno attanāva attānaṁ byākareyya:
analyzed: katamaḥ ca saḥ ānanda dhammādāsaḥ dhammapariyāyaḥ yena samannāgataḥ ariya sāvakaḥ ākaṅkhamānaḥ attanā ava attānam byākareyya

original: ‘khīṇanirayomhi khīṇatiracchānayoni khīṇapettivisayo khīṇāpāyaduggativinipāto, sotāpannohamasmi avinipātadhammo niyato sambodhiparāyaṇo’ti?
analyzed: khīṇa nirayaḥ mhi khīṇa tiracchāna yoni khīṇa petti visayaḥ khīṇa apāya duggati vinipāto so utāpannaḥ ham asmi a vinipāta dhammo niyataḥ sambodhi parāyaṇaḥ ti

original: Idhānanda, ariyasāvako buddhe aveccappasādena samannāgato hoti:
analyzed: idha ānanda ariya sāvakaḥ buddhe avecca ppasādena samannāgataḥ hoti

original: ‘itipi so bhagavā arahaṁ sammāsambuddho vijjācaraṇasampanno sugato lokavidū anuttaro purisadammasārathi satthā devamanussānaṁ buddho bhagavā’ti.
analyzed: iti pi saḥ bhagavā araham sammāsambuddhaḥ vijjā caraṇa sampanno sugataḥ loka vidū anuttaraḥ purisa damma sārathi satthā deva manussānam buddhaḥ bhagavā ati

original: Dhamme aveccappasādena samannāgato hoti:

original: ‘svākkhāto bhagavatā dhammo sandiṭṭhiko akāliko ehipassiko opaneyyiko paccattaṁ veditabbo viññūhī’ti.

original: Saṅghe aveccappasādena samannāgato hoti:

analyzed: suppaṭipannaḥ bhagavataḥ sāvaka saṅghaḥ uju ppaṭipannaḥ bhagavataḥ sāvaka saṅghaḥ ñāya ppaṭipannaḥ

original: bhagavato sāvakasaṅgho, sāmīcippaṭipanno bhagavato sāvakasaṅgho yadidaṁ cattāri purisayugāni
analyzed: bhagavato sāvaka saṅgho sāmīcippaṭipannaḥ bhagavato sāvaka saṅghaḥ yat idam cattāri purisa yugāni

analyzed: aṭṭha purisa puggalā esa bhagavato sāvaka saṅgho āhuneyyaḥ pāhuneyyaḥ dakkhiṇeyyaḥ añjali karaṇīyo

original: anuttaraṁ puññakkhettaṁ lokassā’ti.
analyzed: anuttaram puññakkhettam lokassa ati

original: Ariyakantehi sīlehi samannāgato hoti akhaṇḍehi acchiddehi asabalehi akammāsehi bhujissehi viññūpasatthehi aparāmaṭṭhehi samādhisaṁvattanikehi.
analyzed: ariya kantehi sīlehi samannāgataḥ hoti akhaṇḍehi acchiddehi a sabalehi a kammāsehi bhujissehi viññūpasatthehi a parāmaṭṭhehi samādhi savattanikehi

analyzed: evam kho bhikkhave bhikkhu sataḥ hoti

original: Kathañca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sampajāno hoti?
analyzed: katham ca bhikkhave bhikkhu sampajānaḥ hoti

original: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu abhikkante paṭikkante sampajānakārī hoti, ālokite vilokite
analyzed: idha bhikkhave bhikkhu abhikkante paṭikkante sampajāna kārī hoti ālokite vilokite

original: sampajānakārī hoti, samiñjite pasārite sampajānakārī hoti, saṅghāṭipattacīvaradhāraṇe
analyzed: sampajāna kārī hoti samiñjite pasārite sampajāna kārī hoti saṅghāṭi patta cīvara dhāraṇe

original: sampajānakārī hoti, asite pīte khāyite sāyite sampajānakārī hoti, uccārapassāvakamme
analyzed: sampajāna kārī hoti asite pīte khāyite sāyite sampajāna kārī hoti uccāra passāva kamme

original: sampajānakārī hoti, gate ṭhite nisinne sutte jāgarite bhāsite tuṇhībhāve sampajānakārī hoti.
analyzed: sampajāna kārī hoti gate ṭhite nisinne sutte jāgarite bhāsite tuṇhībhāve sampajāna kārī hoti

original: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sampajāno hoti.
analyzed: evam kho bhikkhave bhikkhu sampajānaḥ hoti

original: Sato, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vihareyya sampajāno,
analyzed: sataḥ bhikkhave bhikkhu vihareyya sampajānaḥ

original: ayaṁ vo amhākaṁ anusāsanī”ti.
analyzed: ayam vaḥ amhākam anusāsanī iti

original: 11. Ambapālīgaṇikā
Assosi kho ambapālī gaṇikā: “bhagavā kira vesāliṁ anuppatto vesāliyaṁ viharati mayhaṁ ambavane”ti.
analyzed: assosi kho ambapālī gaṇikā bhagavā kira vesālim an uppattaḥ vesāliyam viharati mayham ambavane iti

original: Atha kho ambapālī gaṇikā bhaddāni bhaddāni yānāni yojāpetvā bhaddaṁ bhaddaṁ yānaṁ abhiruhitvā bhaddehi bhaddehi yānehi vesāliyā niyyāsi. Yena sako ārāmo tena pāyāsi.
analyzed: atha kho ambapālī gaṇikā bhaddāni bhaddāni yānāni yojāpetvā bhaddam bhaddam yānam abhiruhitvā bhaddehi bhaddehi yānehi vesāliyā niyyāsi yena sakaḥ ārāmaḥ tena pāyāsi

original: Yāvatikā yānassa bhūmi, yānena gantvā, yānā paccorohitvā pattikāva yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi.
analyzed: yāvatikā yānassa bhūmi yānena gantvā yānā paccorohitvā pattikā ava yena bhagavā tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantam abhivādetvā ekamantam nisīdi

original: Ekamantaṁ nisinnaṁ kho ambapāliṁ gaṇikaṁ bhagavā dhammiyā kathāya sandassesi samādapesi samuttejesi sampahaṁsesi.
analyzed: ekamantam nisinnam kho ambapālim gaṇikam bhagavā dhammiyā kathāya sandassesi samādapesi samuttejesi sampahasesi

original: Atha kho ambapālī gaṇikā bhagavatā dhammiyā kathāya sandassitā samādapitā samuttejitā sampahaṁsitā bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: atha kho ambapālī gaṇikā bhagavatā dhammiyā kathāya sandassitā samādapitā samuttejitā sampahasitā bhagavantam etat avoca

original: “adhivāsetu me, bhante, bhagavā svātanāya bhattaṁ saddhiṁ bhikkhusaṅghenā”ti.
analyzed: adhivāsetu me bhante bhagavā svātanāya bhattam saddhim bhikkhu saṅghena ati

original: Adhivāsesi bhagavā tuṇhībhāvena.
analyzed: adhivāsesi bhagavā tuṇhībhāvena

original: Atha kho ambapālī gaṇikā bhagavato adhivāsanaṁ viditvā uṭṭhāyāsanā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṁ katvā pakkāmi.
analyzed: atha kho ambapālī gaṇikā bhagavataḥ adhivāsanam viditvā uṭṭhāya āsanā bhagavantam abhivādetvā padakkhiṇam katvā pakkāmi

original: Assosuṁ kho vesālikā licchavī: “bhagavā kira vesāliṁ anuppatto vesāliyaṁ viharati ambapālivane”ti.
analyzed: assosum kho vesālikāḥ licchavī bhagavā kira vesālim anuppattaḥ vesāliyam viharati ambapāli vane iti

original: Atha kho te licchavī bhaddāni bhaddāni yānāni yojāpetvā bhaddaṁ bhaddaṁ yānaṁ abhiruhitvā bhaddehi bhaddehi yānehi vesāliyā niyyiṁsu.
analyzed: atha kho te licchavī bhaddāni bhaddāni yānāni yojāpetvā bhaddam bhaddam yānam abhiruhitvā bhaddehi bhaddehi yānehi vesāliyāḥ

original: Tatra ekacce licchavī nīlā honti nīlavaṇṇā nīlavatthā nīlālaṅkārā, ekacce licchavī
analyzed: tatra ekacce licchavī nīlāḥ honti nīla vaṇṇāḥ nīla vatthāḥ nīla alaṅkārāḥ ekacce licchavī

original: pītā honti pītavaṇṇā pītavatthā pītālaṅkārā, ekacce licchavī lohitā honti lohitavaṇṇā
analyzed: pītāḥ honti pīta vaṇṇā pīta vatthā pīta alaṅkārāḥ ekacce licchavī lohitāḥ honti lohita vaṇṇā

original: lohitavatthā lohitālaṅkārā, ekacce licchavī odātā honti odātavaṇṇā odātavatthā odātālaṅkārā.
analyzed: lohitavatthāḥ lohita alaṅkārāḥ ekacce licchavī odātāḥ honti odāta vaṇṇāḥ odāta vatthāḥ odāta alaṅkārā

original: Atha kho ambapālī gaṇikā daharānaṁ daharānaṁ licchavīnaṁ akkhena akkhaṁ cakkena cakkaṁ yugena yugaṁ paṭivaṭṭesi.
analyzed: atha kho ambapālī gaṇikā daharānam daharānam licchavīnam akkhena akkham cakkena cakkam yugena yugam paṭivaṭṭesi

original: Atha kho te licchavī ambapāliṁ gaṇikaṁ etadavocuṁ:
analyzed: atha khalu te licchavī ambapālim gaṇikam etat avocuḥ

original: “kiṁ, je ambapāli, daharānaṁ daharānaṁ licchavīnaṁ akkhena akkhaṁ cakkena cakkaṁ yugena yugaṁ paṭivaṭṭesī”ti?
analyzed: ki je ambapāli daharānam daharānam licchavīnam akkhena akkham cakkena cakkam yugena yugam paṭivaṭṭesi iti

original: “Tathā hi pana me, ayyaputtā, bhagavā nimantito svātanāya bhattaṁ saddhiṁ bhikkhusaṅghenā”ti.
analyzed: tathā hi pana me ayya puttā bhagavā nimantito svātanāya bhattam saddhim bhikkhu saṅghena ati

original: “Dehi, je ambapāli, etaṁ bhattaṁ satasahassenā”ti.
analyzed: dehi je ambapāli etam bhattam sata sahassena ati

original: “Sacepi me, ayyaputtā, vesāliṁ sāhāraṁ dassatha, evamahaṁ taṁ bhattaṁ na dassāmī”ti.
analyzed: sace pi me ayya puttāḥ vesālim sa āhāram dassatha evam aham tam bhattam na dassāmi iti

original: Atha kho te licchavī aṅguliṁ phoṭesuṁ:
analyzed: atha kho te licchavī aṅgulim phoṭesu

original: “jitamha vata bho ambakāya, jitamha vata bho ambakāyā”ti.
analyzed: vata bho ambakāya jitamha vata bho ambakāya ati

original: Atha kho te licchavī yena ambapālivanaṁ tena pāyiṁsu.
analyzed: atha kho te licchavī yena ambapālivanam tena

original: Addasā kho bhagavā te licchavī dūratova āgacchante.
analyzed: addasā khalu bhagavā te licchavī dūratas uva āgacchante

original: Disvāna bhikkhū āmantesi:
analyzed: disvāna bhikkhū āmantesi

original: “yesaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhūnaṁ devā tāvatiṁsā adiṭṭhapubbā, oloketha, bhikkhave, licchaviparisaṁ;
analyzed: bhikkhave bhikkhūnam devā tāvatisāḥ a diṭṭha pubbāḥ oloketha bhikkhave

original: apaloketha, bhikkhave, licchaviparisaṁ;
analyzed: bhikkhave licchavi parisa

original: upasaṁharatha, bhikkhave, licchaviparisaṁ—
analyzed: upasaharatha bhikkhave liccha viparisa

original: tāvatiṁsasadisan”ti.
analyzed: tāvati sasadi santi

original: Atha kho te licchavī yāvatikā yānassa bhūmi, yānena gantvā, yānā paccorohitvā pattikāva yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṁsu; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdiṁsu.
analyzed: atha kho te licchavī yāvatikā yānassa bhūmi yānena gantvā yānā paccorohitvā pattikā ava yena bhagavā tena upasaṅkamisu upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantam abhivādetvā ekamantam nisīdisu

original: Ekamantaṁ nisinne kho te licchavī bhagavā dhammiyā kathāya sandassesi samādapesi samuttejesi sampahaṁsesi.
analyzed: ekamantam nisinne kho te licchavī bhagavā dhammiyā kathāya sandassesi samādapesi samuttejesi sampahasesi

original: Atha kho te licchavī bhagavatā dhammiyā kathāya sandassitā samādapitā samuttejitā sampahaṁsitā bhagavantaṁ etadavocuṁ:
analyzed: atha kho te licchavī bhagavatā dhammiyā kathāya sandassitā samādapitā samuttejitā sampahasitā bhagavantam etat avocuḥ

original: “adhivāsetu no, bhante, bhagavā svātanāya bhattaṁ saddhiṁ bhikkhusaṅghenā”ti.
analyzed: adhivāsetu naḥ bhante bhagavā svātanāya bhattam saddhim bhikkhu saṅghena ati

original: Atha kho bhagavā te licchavī etadavoca:
analyzed: atha khalu bhagavān te licchavī etat avoca

original: “adhivutthaṁ kho me, licchavī, svātanāya ambapāliyā gaṇikāya bhattan”ti.
analyzed: adhivuttham kho me licchavī svātanāya ambapāliyā gaṇikāya

original: Atha kho te licchavī aṅguliṁ phoṭesuṁ:
analyzed: atha kho te licchavī aṅgulim phoṭesu

original: “jitamha vata bho ambakāya, jitamha vata bho ambakāyā”ti.
analyzed: vata bho ambakāya jitamha vata bho ambakāya ati

original: Atha kho te licchavī bhagavato bhāsitaṁ abhinanditvā anumoditvā uṭṭhāyāsanā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṁ katvā pakkamiṁsu.
analyzed: atha kho te licchavī bhagavataḥ bhāsitam abhinanditvā anumoditvā uṭṭhāya āsanā bhagavantam abhivādetvā padakkhiṇam katvā pakkamisu

original: Atha kho ambapālī gaṇikā tassā rattiyā accayena sake ārāme paṇītaṁ khādanīyaṁ bhojanīyaṁ paṭiyādāpetvā bhagavato kālaṁ ārocāpesi:
analyzed: atha kho ambapālī gaṇikā tassāḥ rattiyāḥ accayena sake ārāme paṇītam khādanīyam bhojanīyam paṭiyādāpetvā bhagavataḥ kālam ārocāpesi

original: “kālo, bhante, niṭṭhitaṁ bhattan”ti.
analyzed: kālaḥ bhante niṭṭhitam bhattanti

original: Atha kho bhagavā pubbaṇhasamayaṁ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya saddhiṁ bhikkhusaṅghena yena ambapāliyā gaṇikāya nivesanaṁ tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā paññatte āsane nisīdi.
analyzed: atha kho bhagavā pubbaṇha samayam nivāsetvā patta cīvaram ādāya saddhim bhikkhu saṅghena yena ambapāliyāḥ gaṇikāya nivesanam tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā paññatte āsane nisīdi

original: Atha kho ambapālī gaṇikā buddhappamukhaṁ bhikkhusaṅghaṁ paṇītena khādanīyena bhojanīyena sahatthā santappesi sampavāresi.
analyzed: atha kho ambapālī gaṇikā buddha ppamukham bhikkhu saṅgham paṇītena khādanīyena bhojanīyena sahatthā santappesi sampavāresi

original: Atha kho ambapālī gaṇikā bhagavantaṁ bhuttāviṁ onītapattapāṇiṁ aññataraṁ nīcaṁ āsanaṁ gahetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi.
analyzed: atha kho ambapālī gaṇikā bhagavantam bhuttāvim onīta patta pāṇim aññataram nīcam āsanam gahetvā ekamantam nisīdi

original: Ekamantaṁ nisinnā kho ambapālī gaṇikā bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: eka mantam nisinnā khalu ambapālī gaṇikā bhagavantam etat avoca

original: “imāhaṁ, bhante, ārāmaṁ buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa dammī”ti.
analyzed: imā aha bhante ārāmam buddha ppamukhassa bhikkhu saṅghassa dammi iti

original: Paṭiggahesi bhagavā ārāmaṁ.
analyzed: paṭiggahesi bhagavā ārāma

original: Atha kho bhagavā ambapāliṁ gaṇikaṁ dhammiyā kathāya sandassetvā samādapetvā samuttejetvā sampahaṁsetvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkāmi.
analyzed: atha kho bhagavā ambapālim gaṇikam dhammiyā kathāya sandassetvā samādapetvā samuttejetvā sampahasetvā uṭṭhāya āsanā pakkāmi

original: Tatrapi sudaṁ bhagavā vesāliyaṁ viharanto ambapālivane etadeva bahulaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ dhammiṁ kathaṁ karoti:
analyzed: tatra api sudam bhagavā vesāliyam viharantaḥ ambapāli vane etat eva bahulam bhikkhūnam dhammim katham karoti

original: “iti sīlaṁ, iti samādhi, iti paññā.
analyzed: iti sīla iti samādhi iti paññā

original: Sīlaparibhāvito samādhi mahapphalo hoti mahānisaṁso.
analyzed: sīla paribhāvito samādhi mahapphalaḥ hoti mahā nisaso

original: Samādhiparibhāvitā paññā mahapphalā hoti mahānisaṁsā.
analyzed: samādhi paribhāvitā paññā mahapphalā hoti mahā nisasā

original: Paññāparibhāvitaṁ cittaṁ sammadeva āsavehi vimuccati, seyyathidaṁ—
analyzed: paññā paribhāvitam cittam sammat eva āsavehi vimuccati

original: kāmāsavā, bhavāsavā, avijjāsavā”ti.
analyzed: kāma āsavā bhava āsavā avijja āsavā ati

original: 12. Veḷuvagāmavassūpagamana
analyzed: veḷuva gāma vassūpagamana

original: Atha kho bhagavā ambapālivane yathābhirantaṁ viharitvā āyasmantaṁ ānandaṁ āmantesi:
analyzed: atha khalu bhagavān ambapāli vane yathābhirantam viharitvā āyasmantam ānandam āmantesi

original: “āyāmānanda, yena veḷuvagāmako tenupasaṅkamissāmā”ti.
analyzed: āyāma ānanda yena veḷuvagāmakaḥ tena upasaṅkamissāma ati

original: “Evaṁ, bhante”ti kho āyasmā ānando bhagavato paccassosi.
analyzed: eva bhante iti kho āyasmai ānandaḥ bhagavataḥ paccassosi

original: Atha kho bhagavā mahatā bhikkhusaṅghena saddhiṁ yena veḷuvagāmako tadavasari.
analyzed: atha kho bhagavā mahatā bhikkhu saṅghena saddhim yena veḷuvagāmako tat avasari

original: Tatra sudaṁ bhagavā veḷuvagāmake viharati.
analyzed: tatra sudam bhagavā veḷuva gāmake viharati

original: Tatra kho bhagavā bhikkhū āmantesi:
analyzed: tatra kho bhagavā bhikkhū āmantesi

original: “etha tumhe, bhikkhave, samantā vesāliṁ yathāmittaṁ yathāsandiṭṭhaṁ yathāsambhattaṁ vassaṁ upetha.
analyzed: tumhe bhikkhave samantā vesālim yathāmittam yathā sandiṭṭham yathā sambhattam vassam upetha

original: Ahaṁ pana idheva veḷuvagāmake vassaṁ upagacchāmī”ti.
analyzed: aham pana idhā iva veḷuva gāmake vassam upagacchāmi iti

original: “Evaṁ, bhante”ti kho te bhikkhū bhagavato paṭissutvā samantā vesāliṁ yathāmittaṁ yathāsandiṭṭhaṁ yathāsambhattaṁ vassaṁ upagacchiṁsu.
analyzed: eva bhante iti kho te bhikkhū bhagavataḥ paṭissutvā samantā vesālim yathāmittam yathā sandiṭṭham yathāsambhattam vassam upagacchisu

original: Bhagavā pana tattheva veḷuvagāmake vassaṁ upagacchi.
analyzed: bhagavā pana tattha iva veḷuva gāmake vassam upagacchi

original: Atha kho bhagavato vassūpagatassa kharo ābādho uppajji, bāḷhā vedanā vattanti māraṇantikā.
analyzed: atha kho bhagavataḥ vassūpagatassa kharaḥ ābādhaḥ uppajji bāḷhāḥ vedanāḥ vattanti māraṇantikā

original: Tā sudaṁ bhagavā sato sampajāno adhivāsesi avihaññamāno.
analyzed: tā sudam bhagavā sataḥ sampajānaḥ adhivāsesi a vihaññamānaḥ

original: Atha kho bhagavato etadahosi:
analyzed: atha khalu bhagavataḥ

original: “na kho metaṁ patirūpaṁ, yvāhaṁ anāmantetvā upaṭṭhāke anapaloketvā bhikkhusaṅghaṁ parinibbāyeyyaṁ.
analyzed: na kho mā etam patirūpa yvā aham an āmantetvā upaṭṭhāke an apaloketvā bhikkhu saṅgham parinibbāyeyya

original: Yannūnāhaṁ imaṁ ābādhaṁ vīriyena paṭipaṇāmetvā jīvitasaṅkhāraṁ adhiṭṭhāya vihareyyan”ti.
analyzed: yat nūna aham imam ābādham vīriyena paṭipaṇāmetvā jīvita saṅkhāram adhiṭṭhāya vihareyyanti

original: Atha kho bhagavā taṁ ābādhaṁ vīriyena paṭipaṇāmetvā jīvitasaṅkhāraṁ adhiṭṭhāya vihāsi.
analyzed: atha kho bhagavā tam ābādham vīriyena paṭipaṇāmetvā jīvita saṅkhāram adhiṭṭhāya vihāsi

original: Atha kho bhagavato so ābādho paṭippassambhi.
analyzed: atha kho bhagavato saḥ ābādhaḥ paṭippassambhi

original: Atha kho bhagavā gilānā vuṭṭhito aciravuṭṭhito gelaññā vihārā nikkhamma vihārapacchāyāyaṁ paññatte āsane nisīdi.
analyzed: atha kho bhagavā gilānāḥ vuṭṭhitaḥ acira vuṭṭhitaḥ gelaññāḥ vihārāḥ nikkhamma vihāra pacchāya ayam paññatte āsane nisīdi

original: Atha kho āyasmā ānando yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi. Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho āyasmā ānando bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: atha khalu āyasmai ānandaḥ yena bhagavā tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantam abhivādetvā ekamantam nisīdi ekamantam nisinnaḥ khalu āyasmai ānandaḥ bhagavantam etat avoca

original: “diṭṭho me, bhante, bhagavato phāsu; diṭṭhaṁ me, bhante, bhagavato khamanīyaṁ, api ca me, bhante, madhurakajāto viya kāyo.
analyzed: diṭṭhaḥ me bhante bhagavato phāsu diṭṭham me bhante bhagavato api ca me bhante madhuraka jātaḥ kāyo

original: Disāpi me na pakkhāyanti;
analyzed: disā api me na pakkhāyanti

original: dhammāpi maṁ na paṭibhanti bhagavato gelaññena, api ca me, bhante, ahosi kācideva assāsamattā:
analyzed: dhammā api mam na paṭibhanti bhagavataḥ gelaññena api ca me bhante ahosi kācid eva

original: ‘na tāva bhagavā parinibbāyissati, na yāva bhagavā bhikkhusaṅghaṁ ārabbha kiñcideva udāharatī’”ti.
analyzed: na tāva bhagavā parinibbāyissati na yāva bhagavā bhikkhu saṅgham ārabbha kiñcid eva udāharati iti

original: “Kiṁ panānanda, bhikkhusaṅgho mayi paccāsīsati?
analyzed: kim pana ānanda bhikkhu saṅghaḥ mayi paccāsīsati

original: Desito, ānanda, mayā dhammo anantaraṁ abāhiraṁ karitvā.
analyzed: desitaḥ ānanda mayā dhammaḥ anantaram abāhiram karitvā

original: Natthānanda, tathāgatassa dhammesu ācariyamuṭṭhi.
analyzed: nattha ānanda tathāgatassa dhammesu

original: Yassa nūna, ānanda, evamassa:
analyzed: yassa nūna ānanda evam assa

original: ‘ahaṁ bhikkhusaṅghaṁ pariharissāmī’ti vā ‘mamuddesiko bhikkhusaṅgho’ti vā, so nūna, ānanda, bhikkhusaṅghaṁ ārabbha kiñcideva udāhareyya.

original: Parinibbātu dāni, bhante, bhagavā, parinibbātu sugato, parinibbānakālo dāni, bhante, bhagavato”ti.
analyzed: parinibbātu dāni bhante bhagavā parinibbātu sugataḥ parinibbāna kālaḥ dāni bhante bhagavato ti

original: 15. Āyusaṅkhāraossajjana

original: Abhindi kavacamivattasambhavan”ti.
analyzed: abhindi

original: 16. Mahābhūmicālahetu
Atha kho āyasmato ānandassa etadahosi:

original: “acchariyaṁ vata bho, abbhutaṁ vata bho, mahā vatāyaṁ bhūmicālo;
analyzed: acchariyam vata bho abbhutam vata bho mahā vata ayam bhūmicālaḥ

original: sumahā vatāyaṁ bhūmicālo bhiṁsanako salomahaṁso; devadundubhiyo ca phaliṁsu.
analyzed: su mahāḥ vata ayam bhūmicālaḥ bhisanakaḥ ca

original: Ko nu kho hetu ko paccayo mahato bhūmicālassa pātubhāvāyā”ti?

original: Atha kho āyasmā ānando yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami,

original: upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi,
analyzed: upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantam abhivādetvā ekamantam nisīdi

original: ekamantaṁ nisinno kho āyasmā ānando bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:

original: “acchariyaṁ, bhante, abbhutaṁ, bhante.
analyzed: acchariya bhante abbhuta bhante

analyzed: mahā vatāya bhante bhūmicālo

original: sumahā vatāyaṁ, bhante, bhūmicālo bhiṁsanako salomahaṁso; devadundubhiyo ca phaliṁsu.
analyzed: su mahā vatāya bhante bhūmicālaḥ ca

original: Ko nu kho, bhante, hetu ko paccayo mahato bhūmicālassa pātubhāvāyā”ti?

original: “Aṭṭha kho ime, ānanda, hetū, aṭṭha paccayā mahato bhūmicālassa pātubhāvāya.

original: Katame aṭṭha?
analyzed: katame aṭṭha

original: Ayaṁ, ānanda, mahāpathavī udake patiṭṭhitā, udakaṁ vāte patiṭṭhitaṁ, vāto ākāsaṭṭho.
analyzed: ānanda mahā pathavī udake patiṭṭhitā udakam vāte patiṭṭhita vātaḥ ākāsaṭṭhaḥ

original: Hoti kho so, ānanda, samayo, yaṁ mahāvātā vāyanti. Mahāvātā vāyantā udakaṁ kampenti.
analyzed: hoti kho saḥ ānanda samayaḥ yam mahā vātāḥ vāyanti mahā vātāḥ vāyantaḥ udakam kampenti

original: Udakaṁ kampitaṁ pathaviṁ kampeti.
analyzed: udakam kampitam pathavim kampa iti

original: Ayaṁ paṭhamo hetu paṭhamo paccayo mahato bhūmicālassa pātubhāvāya.
analyzed: ayam paṭhamaḥ hetu paṭhamaḥ paccayaḥ mahataḥ bhūmicālassa pātubhāvāya

original: Puna caparaṁ, ānanda, samaṇo vā hoti brāhmaṇo vā iddhimā cetovasippatto, devo vā
analyzed: puna caparaḥ ānanda samaṇaḥ vā hoti brāhmaṇaḥ vā iddhimā cetaḥ vasi pattaḥ devaḥ vā

original: mahiddhiko mahānubhāvo, tassa parittā pathavīsaññā bhāvitā hoti, appamāṇā āposaññā.

original: So imaṁ pathaviṁ kampeti saṅkampeti sampakampeti sampavedheti.
analyzed: saḥ imam pathavim kampeti saṅkampeti sampakampeti sampavedheti

original: Ayaṁ dutiyo hetu dutiyo paccayo mahato bhūmicālassa pātubhāvāya.
analyzed: ayam dutiyaḥ hetu dutiyaḥ paccayaḥ mahataḥ bhūmicālassa pātubhāvāya

original: Puna caparaṁ, ānanda, yadā bodhisatto tusitakāyā cavitvā sato sampajāno mātukucchiṁ okkamati, tadāyaṁ pathavī kampati saṅkampati sampakampati sampavedhati.
analyzed: punar caparaḥ ānanda yadā bodhisatto tusita kāyā cavitvā sataḥ sampajānaḥ mātukucchim okkamati tadā ayam pathavī kampati saṅkampati sampakampati sampavedhati

original: Ayaṁ tatiyo hetu tatiyo paccayo mahato bhūmicālassa pātubhāvāya.

original: Puna caparaṁ, ānanda, yadā bodhisatto sato sampajāno mātukucchismā nikkhamati, tadāyaṁ pathavī kampati saṅkampati sampakampati sampavedhati.
analyzed: puna ca aparaḥ ānanda yadā bodhisatto sataḥ sampajānaḥ mātukucchismā nikkhamati tadā ayam pathavī kampati saṅkampati sampakampati sampavedhati

original: Ayaṁ catuttho hetu catuttho paccayo mahato bhūmicālassa pātubhāvāya.

analyzed: punar ca paraḥ ānanda yadā tathāgataḥ anuttaram sammāsambodhim abhisambujjhati tadā ayam pathavī kampati saṅkampati sampakampati sampavedhati

original: ayaṁ paṭhamo vimokkho.

original: ayaṁ tatiyo vimokkho.
analyzed: ayam tatiyaḥ vimokkho

original: Sabbaso rūpasaññānaṁ samatikkamā paṭighasaññānaṁ atthaṅgamā nānattasaññānaṁ amanasikārā ‘ananto ākāso’ti ākāsānañcāyatanaṁ upasampajja viharati,

original: ayaṁ catuttho vimokkho.
analyzed: ayam catutthaḥ vimokkho

original: Atha kho, ānanda, māro pāpimā yenāhaṁ tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā ekamantaṁ aṭṭhāsi. Ekamantaṁ ṭhito kho, ānanda, māro pāpimā maṁ etadavoca:

original: ‘parinibbātu dāni, bhante, bhagavā; parinibbātu sugato, parinibbānakālo dāni, bhante, bhagavato’ti.

original: ‘sabbeheva piyehi manāpehi nānābhāvo vinābhāvo aññathābhāvo.

original: Taṁ kutettha, ānanda, labbhā, yaṁ taṁ jātaṁ bhūtaṁ saṅkhataṁ palokadhammaṁ, taṁ vata mā palujjīti netaṁ ṭhānaṁ vijjati’.

original: Yaṁ kho panetaṁ, ānanda, tathāgatena cattaṁ vantaṁ muttaṁ pahīnaṁ paṭinissaṭṭhaṁ ossaṭṭho āyusaṅkhāro, ekaṁsena vācā bhāsitā:

original: ‘na ciraṁ tathāgatassa parinibbānaṁ bhavissati.
analyzed: na ciram tathāgatassa parinibbānam bhavissati

original: Ito tiṇṇaṁ māsānaṁ accayena tathāgato parinibbāyissatī’ti.
analyzed: itas tiṇṇam māsānam accayena tathāgataḥ parinibbāyissati iti

original: Tañca tathāgato jīvitahetu puna paccāvamissatīti netaṁ ṭhānaṁ vijjati.
analyzed: tat ca tathāgataḥ jīvita hetu puna paccāvamissati iti na etat ṭhānam vijjati

original: Āyāmānanda, yena mahāvanaṁ kūṭāgārasālā tenupasaṅkamissāmā”ti.
analyzed: āyāma ānanda yena mahā vanam kūṭāgāra sālā tena upasaṅkamissāma ati

original: “Evaṁ, bhante”ti kho āyasmā ānando bhagavato paccassosi.

original: Atha kho bhagavā āyasmatā ānandena saddhiṁ yena mahāvanaṁ kūṭāgārasālā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṁ ānandaṁ āmantesi:

original: Disvā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi. Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho pukkuso mallaputto bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:

original: “acchariyaṁ, bhante, abbhutaṁ, bhante, santena vata, bhante, pabbajitā vihārena viharanti.
analyzed: acchariya bhante abbhuta bhante santena vata bhante pabbajitāḥ vihārena viharanti

original: Bhūtapubbaṁ, bhante, āḷāro kālāmo addhānamaggappaṭipanno maggā okkamma avidūre aññatarasmiṁ rukkhamūle divāvihāraṁ nisīdi.
analyzed: bhūta pubba bhante āḷāraḥ kālāmaḥ addhāna magga ppaṭipanno maggā okkamma avidūre aññatarasmim rukkha mūle divāvihāram nisīdi

original: Atha kho, bhante, pañcamattāni sakaṭasatāni āḷāraṁ kālāmaṁ nissāya nissāya atikkamiṁsu.
analyzed: atha kho bhante pañcamattāni sakaṭa satāni āḷāram kālāmam nissāya nissāya atikkamisu

original: Atha kho, bhante, aññataro puriso tassa sakaṭasatthassa piṭṭhito piṭṭhito āgacchanto yena āḷāro kālāmo tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā āḷāraṁ kālāmaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: atha kho bhante aññataraḥ puriso tassa sakaṭasatthassa piṭṭhitaḥ piṭṭhitaḥ āgacchantaḥ yena āḷāraḥ kālāmo tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā āḷāram kālāmam etat avoca

original: ‘api, bhante, pañcamattāni sakaṭasatāni atikkantāni addasā’ti?
analyzed: api bhante pañcamattāni sakaṭa satāni atikkantāni addasāti

original: ‘Na kho ahaṁ, āvuso, addasan’ti.
analyzed: na khalu aha āvuso addasanti

original: ‘Kiṁ pana, bhante, saddaṁ assosī’ti?
analyzed: kim pana bhante saddam assosi iti

original: ‘Na kho ahaṁ, āvuso, saddaṁ assosin’ti.
analyzed: na kho aha āvuso saddam assosinti

original: ‘Kiṁ pana, bhante, sutto ahosī’ti?
analyzed: kim pana bhante sutto ahosi iti

original: ‘Na kho ahaṁ, āvuso, sutto ahosin’ti.
analyzed: na kho aha āvuso sutto ahosinti

original: ‘Kiṁ pana, bhante, saññī ahosī’ti?
analyzed: kim pana bhante saññī ahosi iti

original: ‘Evamāvuso’ti.
analyzed: evam āvuso iti

original: ‘So tvaṁ, bhante, saññī samāno jāgaro pañcamattāni sakaṭasatāni nissāya nissāya atikkantāni neva addasa, na pana saddaṁ assosi;
analyzed: saḥ tva bhante saññī samānaḥ jāgaro pañcamattāni sakaṭa satāni nissāya nissāya atikkantāni na iva addasa na pana saddam assosi

original: apisu te, bhante, saṅghāṭi rajena okiṇṇā’ti?
analyzed: apisu te bhante saṅghāṭi rajena okiṇṇāti

original: ‘Evamāvuso’ti.
analyzed: evam āvuso iti

original: Atha kho, bhante, tassa purisassa etadahosi:
analyzed: atha kho bhante tassa purisassa etat ahosi

original: ‘acchariyaṁ vata bho, abbhutaṁ vata bho, santena vata bho pabbajitā vihārena viharanti.
analyzed: acchariyam vata bho abbhutam vata bho santena vata bho pabbajitāḥ vihārena viharanti

original: Yatra hi nāma saññī samāno jāgaro pañcamattāni sakaṭasatāni nissāya nissāya atikkantāni neva dakkhati, na pana saddaṁ sossatī’ti.
analyzed: yatra hi nāma saññī samānaḥ jāgaraḥ pañcamattāni sakaṭa satāni nissāya nissāya atikkantāni na iva dakkhati na pana saddam sossati iti

original: Āḷāre kālāme uḷāraṁ pasādaṁ pavedetvā pakkāmī”ti.
analyzed: āḷāre kālāme uḷāram pasādam pavedetvā pakkāmi iti

original: “Taṁ kiṁ maññasi, pukkusa,
analyzed: tam kim maññasi pukkusa

original: katamaṁ nu kho dukkarataraṁ vā durabhisambhavataraṁ vā—
analyzed: katamam nu khalu dukkarataram vā durabhisambhavataram vā

original: yo vā saññī samāno jāgaro pañcamattāni sakaṭasatāni nissāya nissāya atikkantāni neva passeyya, na pana saddaṁ suṇeyya;
analyzed: yaḥ vā saññī samānaḥ jāgaraḥ pañcamattāni sakaṭa satāni nissāya nissāya atikkantāni na iva passeyya na pana saddam suṇeyya

original: yo vā saññī samāno jāgaro deve vassante deve gaḷagaḷāyante vijjullatāsu niccharantīsu asaniyā phalantiyā neva passeyya, na pana saddaṁ suṇeyyā”ti?
analyzed: yaḥ vā saññī samānaḥ jāgaraḥ deve vassante deve gaḷagaḷāyante vijjullatāsu niccharantīsu asaniyā phalantiyā na iva passeyya na pana saddam suṇeyya ati

original: “Kiñhi, bhante, karissanti pañca vā sakaṭasatāni cha vā sakaṭasatāni satta vā sakaṭasatāni aṭṭha vā sakaṭasatāni nava vā sakaṭasatāni, sakaṭasahassaṁ vā sakaṭasatasahassaṁ vā.
analyzed: kim hi bhante karissanti pañca vā sakaṭa satāni cha vā sakaṭa satāni satta vā sakaṭa satāni aṭṭha vā sakaṭa satāni nava vā sakaṭa satāni sakaṭa sahassam vā sakaṭa sata sahassam vā

original: Atha kho etadeva dukkaratarañceva durabhisambhavatarañca yo saññī samāno jāgaro deve
analyzed: atha kho etat eva dukkaratarañca ca iva durabhisambhavatarañca yaḥ saññī samānaḥ jāgaraḥ deve

original: vassante deve gaḷagaḷāyante vijjullatāsu niccharantīsu asaniyā phalantiyā neva passeyya,
analyzed: vassante deve gaḷagaḷāyante vijjullatāsu niccharantīsu asaniyā phalantiyā na iva passeyya

original: na pana saddaṁ suṇeyyā”ti.
analyzed: na pana saddam suṇeyya ati

original: “Ekamidāhaṁ, pukkusa, samayaṁ ātumāyaṁ viharāmi bhusāgāre.
analyzed: ekam id āha pukkusa samayam viharāmi bhusāgāre

original: Tena kho pana samayena deve vassante deve gaḷagaḷāyante vijjullatāsu niccharantīsu asaniyā phalantiyā avidūre bhusāgārassa dve kassakā bhātaro hatā cattāro ca balibaddā.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena deve vassante deve gaḷagaḷāyante vijjullatāsu niccharantīsu asaniyā phalantiyā avidūre bhusāgārassa dve kassakāḥ bhātaraḥ hatā cattāro ca balibaddāḥ

original: Atha kho, pukkusa, ātumāya mahājanakāyo nikkhamitvā yena te dve kassakā bhātaro hatā cattāro ca balibaddā tenupasaṅkami.
analyzed: atha kho pukkusaḥ ātumāya mahā jana kāyaḥ nikkhamitvā yena te dve kassakāḥ bhātaraḥ hatā cattāro ca balibaddā tena upasaṅkami

original: Tena kho panāhaṁ, pukkusa, samayena bhusāgārā nikkhamitvā bhusāgāradvāre abbhokāse caṅkamāmi.
analyzed: tena kho pana aha pukkusa samayena bhusāgārā nikkhamitvā bhusāgāra dvāre abbhokāse caṅkamāmi

original: Atha kho, pukkusa, aññataro puriso tamhā mahājanakāyā yenāhaṁ tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā
analyzed: atha kho pukkusa aññataraḥ puriso tamhā mahā jana kāyā yena aham tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā

original: maṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ aṭṭhāsi. Ekamantaṁ ṭhitaṁ kho ahaṁ, pukkusa, taṁ purisaṁ etadavocaṁ:
analyzed: mam abhivādetvā ekamantam aṭṭhāsi ekamantam ṭhitam kho aha pukkusa tam purisam etat avoca

original: ‘kiṁ nu kho eso, āvuso, mahājanakāyo sannipatito’ti?
analyzed: kim nu kho eso āvuso mahā jana kāyo sannipatito ti

original: ‘Idāni, bhante, deve vassante deve gaḷagaḷāyante vijjullatāsu niccharantīsu asaniyā phalantiyā dve kassakā bhātaro hatā cattāro ca balibaddā.
analyzed: idāni bhante deve vassante deve gaḷagaḷāyante vijjullatāsu niccharantīsu asaniyā phalantiyā dve kassakā bhātaraḥ hatā cattāraḥ ca balibaddā

analyzed: ettha iso mahā jana kāyo sannipatito

analyzed: kim pana bhante addasāti

original: ‘Na kho ahaṁ, āvuso, addasan’ti.

original: ‘Kiṁ pana, bhante, saddaṁ assosī’ti?
analyzed: kim pana bhante saddam assosi iti

original: ‘Na kho ahaṁ, āvuso, saddaṁ assosin’ti.
analyzed: na kho aha āvuso saddam assosinti

original: ‘Kiṁ pana, bhante, sutto ahosī’ti?
analyzed: kim pana bhante sutto ahosi iti

original: ‘Na kho ahaṁ, āvuso, sutto ahosin’ti.
analyzed: na kho aha āvuso sutto ahosinti

original: ‘Kiṁ pana, bhante, saññī ahosī’ti?
analyzed: kim pana bhante saññī ahosi iti

original: ‘Evamāvuso’ti.
analyzed: evam āvuso iti

original: ‘So tvaṁ, bhante, saññī samāno jāgaro deve vassante deve gaḷagaḷāyante vijjullatāsu niccharantīsu asaniyā phalantiyā neva addasa, na pana saddaṁ assosī’ti?
analyzed: saḥ tva bhante saññī samānaḥ jāgaraḥ deve vassante deve gaḷagaḷāyante vijjullatāsu niccharantīsu asaniyā phalantiyā na iva addasa na pana saddam assosi iti

original: ‘Evamāvuso’ti?
analyzed: evam āvuso iti

original: Atha kho, pukkusa, tassa purisassa etadahosi:
analyzed: atha kho pukkusa tassa purisassa etat ahosi

original: ‘acchariyaṁ vata bho, abbhutaṁ vata bho, santena vata bho pabbajitā vihārena viharanti.
analyzed: acchariyam vata bho abbhutam vata bho santena vata bho pabbajitāḥ vihārena viharanti

original: Yatra hi nāma saññī samāno jāgaro deve vassante deve gaḷagaḷāyante vijjullatāsu niccharantīsu asaniyā phalantiyā neva dakkhati, na pana saddaṁ sossatī’ti.
analyzed: yatra hi nāma saññī samānaḥ jāgaraḥ deve vassante deve gaḷagaḷāyante vijjullatāsu niccharantīsu asaniyā phalantiyā na iva dakkhati na pana saddam sossati iti

original: Mayi uḷāraṁ pasādaṁ pavedetvā maṁ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṁ katvā pakkāmī”ti.
analyzed: mayi uḷāram pasādam pavedetvā mam abhivādetvā padakkhiṇam katvā pakkāmi iti

original: Evaṁ vutte, pukkuso mallaputto bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: evam vutte pukkusaḥ malla puttaḥ bhagavantam etat avoca

original: “esāhaṁ, bhante, yo me āḷāre kālāme pasādo taṁ mahāvāte vā ophuṇāmi sīghasotāya vā nadiyā pavāhemi.
analyzed: esā aha bhante yaḥ me āḷāre kālāme pasādaḥ tam mahā vāte vā ophuṇāmi sīghasotāya vā nadiyā pavāhemi

original: Abhikkantaṁ, bhante, abhikkantaṁ, bhante.
analyzed: abhikkanta bhante abhikkanta bhante

original: Seyyathāpi, bhante, nikkujjitaṁ vā ukkujjeyya, paṭicchannaṁ vā vivareyya, mūḷhassa
analyzed: sā iyyathā api bhante nikkujjitam vā ukkujjeyya paṭicchannam vā vivareyya mūḷhassa

original: vā maggaṁ ācikkheyya, andhakāre vā telapajjotaṁ dhāreyya: ‘cakkhumanto rūpāni dakkhantī’ti;
analyzed: vā maggam ācikkheyya andhakāre vā tela pajjotam dhāreyya cakkhumantaḥ rūpāni dakkhanti iti

original: evamevaṁ bhagavatā anekapariyāyena dhammo pakāsito.
analyzed: evam evam bhagavatā aneka pariyāyena dhammo pakāsito

original: Esāhaṁ, bhante, bhagavantaṁ saraṇaṁ gacchāmi dhammañca bhikkhusaṅghañca.
analyzed: esā aha bhante bhagavantam saraṇam gacchāmi dhammañca bhikkhu saṅghañca

original: Upāsakaṁ maṁ bhagavā dhāretu ajjatagge pāṇupetaṁ saraṇaṁ gatan”ti.
analyzed: upāsakam mam bhagavā dhāretu ajjatagge pāṇa upetam saraṇam gatanti

original: Atha kho pukkuso mallaputto aññataraṁ purisaṁ āmantesi:
analyzed: atha kho pukkusaḥ malla puttaḥ aññataram purisam āmantesi

original: “iṅgha me tvaṁ, bhaṇe, siṅgīvaṇṇaṁ yugamaṭṭhaṁ dhāraṇīyaṁ āharā”ti.
analyzed: me bhaṇe siṅgī vaṇṇam yuga maṭṭham dhāraṇīyam āharāti

original: “Evaṁ, bhante”ti kho so puriso pukkusassa mallaputtassa paṭissutvā taṁ siṅgīvaṇṇaṁ yugamaṭṭhaṁ dhāraṇīyaṁ āhari.
analyzed: eva bhante iti kho so purisaḥ pukkusassa malla puttassa paṭissutvā tam siṅgī vaṇṇam yuga maṭṭham dhāraṇīyam āhari

original: Atha kho pukkuso mallaputto taṁ siṅgīvaṇṇaṁ yugamaṭṭhaṁ dhāraṇīyaṁ bhagavato upanāmesi:
analyzed: atha kho pukkusaḥ malla putto tam siṅgī vaṇṇam yuga maṭṭham dhāraṇīyam bhagavataḥ upanāmesi

original: “idaṁ, bhante, siṅgīvaṇṇaṁ yugamaṭṭhaṁ dhāraṇīyaṁ, taṁ me bhagavā paṭiggaṇhātu anukampaṁ upādāyā”ti.
analyzed: bhante siṅgī vaṇṇam yuga maṭṭham tam me bhagavā paṭiggaṇhātu anukampam upādāya ati

original: “Tena hi, pukkusa, ekena maṁ acchādehi, ekena ānandan”ti.
analyzed: tena hi pukkusa ekena mama acchādehi ekena ānandanti

original: “Evaṁ, bhante”ti kho pukkuso mallaputto bhagavato paṭissutvā ekena bhagavantaṁ acchādeti, ekena āyasmantaṁ ānandaṁ.
analyzed: eva bhante iti kho pukkusaḥ malla puttaḥ bhagavataḥ paṭissutvā ekena bhagavantam acchādeti ekena āyasmantam ānanda

original: Atha kho bhagavā pukkusaṁ mallaputtaṁ dhammiyā kathāya sandassesi samādapesi samuttejesi sampahaṁsesi.
analyzed: atha kho bhagavā pukkusam malla puttam dhammiyā kathāya sandassesi samādapesi samuttejesi sampahasesi

original: Atha kho pukkuso mallaputto bhagavatā dhammiyā kathāya sandassito samādapito samuttejito sampahaṁsito uṭṭhāyāsanā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṁ katvā pakkāmi.
analyzed: atha kho pukkusaḥ malla puttaḥ bhagavatā dhammiyā kathāya sandassitaḥ samādapitaḥ samuttejitaḥ sampahasitaḥ uṭṭhāya āsanā bhagavantam abhivādetvā padakkhiṇam katvā pakkāmi

original: Atha kho āyasmā ānando acirapakkante pukkuse mallaputte taṁ siṅgīvaṇṇaṁ yugamaṭṭhaṁ dhāraṇīyaṁ bhagavato kāyaṁ upanāmesi.
analyzed: atha kho āyasmai ānandaḥ acira pakkante pukkuse malla putte tam siṅgī vaṇṇam yuga maṭṭham dhāraṇīyam bhagavataḥ kāyam upanāmesi

original: Taṁ bhagavato kāyaṁ upanāmitaṁ hataccikaṁ viya khāyati.
analyzed: tam bhagavataḥ kāyam upanāmitam hataccikam viya khāyati

original: Atha kho āyasmā ānando bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: atha khalu āyasmai ānandaḥ bhagavantam etat avoca

original: “acchariyaṁ, bhante, abbhutaṁ, bhante, yāva parisuddho, bhante, tathāgatassa chavivaṇṇo pariyodāto.
analyzed: acchariya bhante abbhuta bhante yāva parisuddhaḥ bhante tathāgatassa chavi vaṇṇaḥ pariyodāto

original: Idaṁ, bhante, siṅgīvaṇṇaṁ yugamaṭṭhaṁ dhāraṇīyaṁ bhagavato kāyaṁ upanāmitaṁ hataccikaṁ viya khāyatī”ti.
analyzed: idam bhante siṅgī vaṇṇam yuga maṭṭham dhāraṇīyam bhagavato kāyam upanāmitam hataccikam viya khāyati iti

original: “Evametaṁ, ānanda, evametaṁ, ānanda, dvīsu kālesu ativiya tathāgatassa kāyo parisuddho hoti chavivaṇṇo pariyodāto.
analyzed: evam ete ānanda evam ete ānanda dvīsu kālesu ativiya tathāgatassa kāyo parisuddhaḥ hoti chavi vaṇṇaḥ pariyodāto

original: Katamesu dvīsu?
analyzed: katamesu dvīsu

original: Yañca, ānanda, rattiṁ tathāgato anuttaraṁ sammāsambodhiṁ abhisambujjhati, yañca rattiṁ anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbāyati.
analyzed: yañca ānanda rattim tathāgataḥ anuttaram sammāsambodhim abhisambujjhati yañca rattim an upādisesāya nibbāna dhātuyā parinibbāyati

original: Imesu kho, ānanda, dvīsu kālesu ativiya tathāgatassa kāyo parisuddho hoti chavivaṇṇo pariyodāto.
analyzed: imesu kho ānanda dvīsu kālesu ativiya tathāgatassa kāyo parisuddhaḥ hoti chavi vaṇṇaḥ pariyodāto

original: Ajja kho panānanda, rattiyā pacchime yāme kusinārāyaṁ upavattane mallānaṁ sālavane antarena yamakasālānaṁ tathāgatassa parinibbānaṁ bhavissati.
analyzed: ajja kho pana ānanda rattiyā pacchime yāme kusinārāyam upavattane mallānam sālavane antarena yamakasālānam tathāgatassa parinibbānam bhavissati

original: Āyāmānanda, yena kakudhā nadī tenupasaṅkamissāmā”ti.
analyzed: āyāma ānanda yena kakudhā nadī tena upasaṅkamissāma ati

original: “Evaṁ, bhante”ti kho āyasmā ānando bhagavato paccassosi.
analyzed: eva bhante iti kho āyasmai ānandaḥ bhagavataḥ paccassosi

original: Siṅgīvaṇṇaṁ yugamaṭṭhaṁ,
analyzed: siṅgī vaṇṇam

original: pukkuso abhihārayi;
analyzed: pukkusaḥ abhihārayi

original: Tena acchādito satthā,
analyzed: tena a chāditaḥ satthā

original: hemavaṇṇo asobhathāti.
analyzed: hema vaṇṇaḥ asobhatha iti

original: Atha kho bhagavā mahatā bhikkhusaṅghena saddhiṁ yena kakudhā nadī tenupasaṅkami;
analyzed: atha kho bhagavā mahatā bhikkhu saṅghena saddhim yena kakudhā nadī tena upasaṅkami

original: upasaṅkamitvā kakudhaṁ nadiṁ ajjhogāhetvā nhatvā ca pivitvā ca paccuttaritvā yena
analyzed: upasaṅkamitvā kakudham nadim ajjhogāhetvā nhatvā ca pivitvā ca paccuttaritvā yena

original: ambavanaṁ tenupasaṅkami.
analyzed: ambavanam tena upasaṅkami

original: Upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṁ cundakaṁ āmantesi:
analyzed: upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantam cundakam āmantesi

original: “iṅgha me tvaṁ, cundaka, catugguṇaṁ saṅghāṭiṁ paññapehi, kilantosmi, cundaka, nipajjissāmī”ti.
analyzed: iṅgha me tva cundaka catugguṇam saṅghāṭim paññapehi kilantaḥ asmi cundaka nipajjissāmi iti

original: “Evaṁ, bhante”ti kho āyasmā cundako bhagavato paṭissutvā catugguṇaṁ saṅghāṭiṁ paññapesi.
analyzed: eva bhante iti kho āyasmā cundakaḥ bhagavataḥ paṭissutvā catugguṇam saṅghāṭim paññapesi

original: Atha kho bhagavā dakkhiṇena passena sīhaseyyaṁ kappesi pāde pādaṁ accādhāya sato sampajāno uṭṭhānasaññaṁ manasikaritvā.
analyzed: atha kho bhagavā dakkhiṇena passena sīha seyyam kappesi pāde pādam accādhāya sataḥ sampajānaḥ uṭṭhāna saññam manasikaritvā

original: ‘Idha tathāgato anuttaraṁ sammāsambodhiṁ abhisambuddho’ti, ānanda, saddhassa kulaputtassa dassanīyaṁ saṁvejanīyaṁ ṭhānaṁ.

original: ‘Idha tathāgatena anuttaraṁ dhammacakkaṁ pavattitan’ti, ānanda, saddhassa kulaputtassa dassanīyaṁ saṁvejanīyaṁ ṭhānaṁ.

original: ‘idha tathāgato jāto’tipi, ‘idha tathāgato anuttaraṁ sammāsambodhiṁ abhisambuddho’tipi,
analyzed: idha tathāgataḥ jātaḥ itipi idha tathāgataḥ anuttaram sammāsambodhim abhisambuddhaḥ itipi

analyzed: idha tathāgatena anuttaram dhammacakkam idha tathāgataḥ an upādisesāya

original: nibbānadhātuyā parinibbuto’tipi.

original: Ye hi keci, ānanda, cetiyacārikaṁ āhiṇḍantā pasannacittā kālaṁ karissanti, sabbe te kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā sugatiṁ saggaṁ lokaṁ upapajjissantī”ti.
analyzed: ye hi keci ānanda cetiya cārikam āhiṇḍantā pasanna cittā kālam karissanti sabbe te kāyassa bhedā param maraṇā sugatim saggam lokam upapajjissanti iti

analyzed: dassane bhagavā sati katham paṭipajjitabban ti

analyzed: an ālāpaḥ ānanda ati

analyzed: santa ānanda khattiya paṇḍitā api brāhmaṇa paṇḍitā api gahapati paṇḍitā api tathāgate abhippasannā te tathāgatassa sarīra pūjam karissanti iti

analyzed: cakkavattissa sarīram jhāpenti

original: Cātumahāpathe tathāgatassa thūpo kātabbo.
analyzed: cātumahāpathe tathāgatassa thūpo kātabbo

original: Tattha ye mālaṁ vā gandhaṁ vā cuṇṇakaṁ vā āropessanti vā abhivādessanti vā cittaṁ vā pasādessanti tesaṁ taṁ bhavissati dīgharattaṁ hitāya sukhāya.

analyzed: te tattha cittam pasādetvā kāyassa bhedā param maraṇā sugatim saggam lokam upapajjanti

analyzed: cattāro me bhikkhave acchariyāḥ abbhutāḥ dhammāḥ raññe cakkavattimhi

original: Katame cattāro?
analyzed: katame cattāro

original: Sace, bhikkhave, khattiyaparisā rājānaṁ cakkavattiṁ dassanāya upasaṅkamati, dassanena sā attamanā hoti.
analyzed: sace bhikkhave khattiya parisā rājānam cakkavattim dassanāya upasaṅkamati dassanena sā attamanā hoti

analyzed: tatra ce rājā cakkavattī bhāsati sā atta manāḥ

analyzed: atittāva bhikkhave khattiya parisā hoti atha kho rājā cakkavattī tuṇhī hoti

analyzed: sace bhikkhave brāhmaṇa parisā pe

original: gahapatiparisā …pe…
analyzed: gahapati parisā pe

analyzed: samaṇa parisā rājānam cakkavattim dassanāya upasaṅkamati dassanena sā attamanā hoti

original: Tatra ce rājā cakkavattī bhāsati, bhāsitenapi sā attamanā hoti.
analyzed: tatra ce rājā cakkavattī bhāsati sā atta manāḥ

analyzed: atittāva bhikkhave samaṇa parisā hoti atha kho rājā cakkavattī tuṇhī hoti

analyzed: upāsikā parisā ānandam dassanāya upasaṅkamati dassanena sā attamanā hoti

original: Tatra ce ānando dhammaṁ bhāsati, bhāsitenapi sā attamanā hoti.
analyzed: tatra ce ānandaḥ dhammam bhāsati bhāsitena api sā atta manāḥ hoti

original: Atittāva, bhikkhave, upāsikāparisā hoti.
analyzed: atittāva bhikkhave upāsikā parisā hoti

analyzed: ime kho bhikkhave cattāro acchariyāḥ abbhutāḥ dhammāḥ ānandeti

original: 32. Mahāsudassanasuttadesanā
Evaṁ vutte, āyasmā ānando bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: evam vutte āyasmai ānandaḥ bhagavantam etat avoca

original: “mā, bhante, bhagavā imasmiṁ khuddakanagarake ujjaṅgalanagarake sākhānagarake parinibbāyi.
analyzed: mā bhante bhagavā imasmin khuddaka nagarake ujjaṅgala nagarake sākhā nagarake parinibbāyi

original: Santi, bhante, aññāni mahānagarāni, seyyathidaṁ—
analyzed: santi bhante aññāni mahā nagarāni

original: campā rājagahaṁ sāvatthī sāketaṁ kosambī bārāṇasī;
analyzed: campā rājagaham sāvatthī sāketam kosambī bārāṇasī

original: ettha bhagavā parinibbāyatu.
analyzed: ettha bhagavā parinibbāyatu

original: Ettha bahū khattiyamahāsālā, brāhmaṇamahāsālā gahapatimahāsālā tathāgate abhippasannā.
analyzed: ettha bahū khattiya mahā sālā brāhmaṇa mahā sālā gahapati mahā sālā tathāgate abhippasannā

original: Te tathāgatassa sarīrapūjaṁ karissantī”ti
analyzed: te tathāgatassa sarīra pūjam karissanti iti

original: “mā hevaṁ, ānanda, avaca, mā hevaṁ, ānanda, avaca:
analyzed: mā hā iva ānanda avaca mā hā iva ānanda avaca

original: ‘khuddakanagarakaṁ ujjaṅgalanagarakaṁ sākhānagarakan’ti.
analyzed: khuddaka nagarakam ujjaṅgala nagarakam sākhā nagarakam ti

original: Bhūtapubbaṁ, ānanda, rājā mahāsudassano nāma ahosi cakkavattī dhammiko dhammarājā cāturanto vijitāvī janapadatthāvariyappatto sattaratanasamannāgato.
analyzed: bhūta pubbaḥ ānanda rājā mahāsudassanaḥ nāma ahosi cakkavattī dhammikaḥ dhamma rājā cāturantaḥ vijitāvī janapadatthāvariya ppatto satta ratana samannāgato

original: Rañño, ānanda, mahāsudassanassa ayaṁ kusinārā kusāvatī nāma rājadhānī ahosi.
analyzed: raññaḥ ānanda mahāsudassanassa ayam kusinārā kusāvatī nāma rājadhānī ahosi

original: puratthimena ca pacchimena ca dvādasayojanāni āyāmena; uttarena ca dakkhiṇena ca sattayojanāni vitthārena.
analyzed: puratthimena ca pacchimena ca dvādasa yojanāni āyāmena uttarena ca dakkhiṇena ca satta yojanāni vitthārena

original: Kusāvatī, ānanda, rājadhānī iddhā ceva ahosi phītā ca bahujanā ca ākiṇṇamanussā ca subhikkhā ca.
analyzed: kusāvatī ānanda rājadhānī iddhā ca iva ahosi phītā ca bahu janā ca ākiṇṇa manussā ca subhikkhā ca

original: Seyyathāpi, ānanda, devānaṁ āḷakamandā nāma rājadhānī iddhā ceva hoti phītā ca bahujanā ca ākiṇṇayakkhā ca subhikkhā ca;
analyzed: sā iyyathā api ānanda devānam āḷakamandā nāma rājadhānī iddhā ca iva hoti phītā ca bahu janā ca ākiṇṇa yakkhā ca subhikkhā ca

original: evameva kho, ānanda, kusāvatī rājadhānī iddhā ceva ahosi phītā ca bahujanā ca ākiṇṇamanussā ca subhikkhā ca.
analyzed: evam eva kho ānanda kusāvatī rājadhānī iddhā ca iva ahosi phītā ca bahu janā ca ākiṇṇa manussā ca subhikkhā ca

original: Kusāvatī, ānanda, rājadhānī dasahi saddehi avivittā ahosi divā ceva rattiñca, seyyathidaṁ—
analyzed: kusāvatī ānanda rājadhānī dasahi saddehi avivittā ahosi divā ca iva rattiñca

original: hatthisaddena assasaddena rathasaddena bherisaddena mudiṅgasaddena vīṇāsaddena gītasaddena saṅkhasaddena sammasaddena pāṇitāḷasaddena ‘asnātha pivatha khādathā’ti dasamena saddena.
analyzed: hatthi saddena assa saddena ratha saddena bheri saddena mudiṅga saddena vīṇā saddena gīta saddena saṅkha saddena samma saddena pāṇitāḷa saddena asnātha pivatha khādatha ati dasamena saddena

original: Gaccha tvaṁ, ānanda, kusināraṁ pavisitvā kosinārakānaṁ mallānaṁ ārocehi:
analyzed: gaccha tvaḥ ānanda kusināram pavisitvā kosinārakānam mallānam ārocehi

original: ‘ajja kho, vāseṭṭhā, rattiyā pacchime yāme tathāgatassa parinibbānaṁ bhavissati.
analyzed: ajja kho vāseṭṭhāḥ rattiyā pacchime yāme tathāgatassa parinibbānam bhavissati

original: Abhikkamatha, vāseṭṭhā, abhikkamatha, vāseṭṭhā.
analyzed: abhikkamatha vāseṭṭhāḥ abhikkamatha vāseṭṭhāḥ

original: Mā pacchā vippaṭisārino ahuvattha—
analyzed: mā pacchā vippaṭisārinaḥ ahuvattha

original: amhākañca no gāmakkhette tathāgatassa parinibbānaṁ ahosi, na mayaṁ labhimhā pacchime kāle tathāgataṁ dassanāyā’”ti.
analyzed: amhākam ca no gāmakkhette tathāgatassa parinibbānam ahosi na mayam labhimhā pacchime kāle tathāgatam dassanāya ati

original: “Evaṁ, bhante”ti kho āyasmā ānando bhagavato paṭissutvā nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya attadutiyo kusināraṁ pāvisi.
analyzed: eva bhanta iti kho āyasmai ānandaḥ bhagavataḥ paṭissutvā nivāsetvā patta cīvaram ādāya atta dutiyaḥ kusināram pāvisi

original: 33. Mallānaṁvandanā
Tena kho pana samayena kosinārakā mallā sandhāgāre sannipatitā honti kenacideva karaṇīyena.
analyzed: tena khalu pana samayena kosi nārakāḥ mallāḥ sandhāgāre sannipatitāḥ honti kenacid eva karaṇīyena

original: Atha kho āyasmā ānando yena kosinārakānaṁ mallānaṁ sandhāgāraṁ tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā kosinārakānaṁ mallānaṁ ārocesi:
analyzed: atha kho āyasmai ānandaḥ yena kosi nārakānam mallānam sandhāgāram tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā kosi nārakānam mallānam ārocesi

original: “ajja kho, vāseṭṭhā, rattiyā pacchime yāme tathāgatassa parinibbānaṁ bhavissati.
analyzed: ajja kho vāseṭṭhāḥ rattiyā pacchime yāme tathāgatassa parinibbānam bhavissati

original: Abhikkamatha, vāseṭṭhā, abhikkamatha, vāseṭṭhā.
analyzed: abhikkamatha vāseṭṭhāḥ abhikkamatha vāseṭṭhāḥ

original: Mā pacchā vippaṭisārino ahuvattha:
analyzed: mā pacchā vippaṭisārinaḥ ahuvattha

original: ‘amhākañca no gāmakkhette tathāgatassa parinibbānaṁ ahosi, na mayaṁ labhimhā pacchime kāle tathāgataṁ dassanāyā’”ti.
analyzed: amhākam ca no gāmakkhette tathāgatassa parinibbānam ahosi na mayam labhimhā pacchime kāle tathāgatam dassanāya ati

original: Idamāyasmato ānandassa vacanaṁ sutvā mallā ca mallaputtā ca mallasuṇisā ca mallapajāpatiyo
analyzed: idam āyasmataḥ ānandassa vacanam sutvā mallā ca mallaputtā ca mallasuṇisā ca malla pajāpatiyo

original: ca aghāvino dummanā cetodukkhasamappitā appekacce kese pakiriya kandanti, bāhā paggayha
analyzed: ca aghāvinaḥ dummanā cetaḥ dukkha samappitāḥ appa ekacce kese pakiriya kandanti bāhā paggayha

original: kandanti, chinnapātaṁ papatanti, āvaṭṭanti vivaṭṭanti:
analyzed: kandanti chinna pātam papatanti āvaṭṭanti vivaṭṭanti

original: “atikhippaṁ bhagavā parinibbāyissati, atikhippaṁ sugato parinibbāyissati, atikhippaṁ cakkhuṁ loke antaradhāyissatī”ti.
analyzed: atikhippam bhagavā parinibbāyissati atikhippam sugataḥ parinibbāyissati atikhippam cakkhum loke antaradhāyissati iti

original: Atha kho mallā ca mallaputtā ca mallasuṇisā ca mallapajāpatiyo ca aghāvino dummanā cetodukkhasamappitā yena upavattanaṁ mallānaṁ sālavanaṁ yenāyasmā ānando tenupasaṅkamiṁsu.
analyzed: atha kho mallā ca mallaputtā ca mallasuṇisā ca malla pajāpatiyo ca aghāvinaḥ dummanā cetaḥ dukkha samappitā yena upavattanam mallānam sālavanam yena ayasmai ānandaḥ tena upasaṅkamisu

original: Atha kho āyasmato ānandassa etadahosi:
analyzed: atha kho āyasmataḥ ānandassa etat ahosi

original: “sace kho ahaṁ kosinārake malle ekamekaṁ bhagavantaṁ vandāpessāmi, avandito bhagavā kosinārakehi mallehi bhavissati, athāyaṁ ratti vibhāyissati.
analyzed: sace kho aham kosinārake malle ekam ekam bhagavantam vandāpessāmi a vanditaḥ bhagavā kosinārakehi mallehi bhavissati atha ayam ratti vibhāyissati

original: Yannūnāhaṁ kosinārake malle kulaparivattaso kulaparivattaso ṭhapetvā bhagavantaṁ vandāpeyyaṁ:
analyzed: yat nūna aham kosinārake malle kula parivattaso kula parivattaso ṭhapetvā bhagavantam vandāpeyya

original: ‘itthannāmo, bhante, mallo saputto sabhariyo sapariso sāmacco bhagavato pāde sirasā vandatī’”ti.
analyzed: itthannāmaḥ bhante mallaḥ sa puttaḥ sa bhariyaḥ sa parisaḥ sa amaccaḥ bhagavataḥ pāde sirasā vandati iti

original: Atha kho āyasmā ānando kosinārake malle kulaparivattaso kulaparivattaso ṭhapetvā bhagavantaṁ vandāpesi:
analyzed: atha kho āyasmai ānandaḥ kosinārake malle kula parivattaso kula parivattaso ṭhapetvā bhagavantam vandāpesi

original: “itthannāmo, bhante, mallo saputto sabhariyo sapariso sāmacco bhagavato pāde sirasā vandatī”ti.
analyzed: itthannāmaḥ bhante mallaḥ sa puttaḥ sa bhariyaḥ sa parisaḥ sa amaccaḥ bhagavataḥ pāde sirasā vandati iti

original: Atha kho āyasmā ānando etena upāyena paṭhameneva yāmena kosinārake malle bhagavantaṁ vandāpesi.
analyzed: atha kho āyasmai ānandaḥ etena upāyena paṭhamena iva yāmena kosinārake malle bhagavantam vandāpesi

original: 34. Subhaddaparibbājakavatthu
analyzed: subhadda paribbājaka vatthu

original: Tena kho pana samayena subhaddo nāma paribbājako kusinārāyaṁ paṭivasati.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena subhaddaḥ nāma paribbājakaḥ kusinārāyam paṭivasati

original: Assosi kho subhaddo paribbājako:
analyzed: assosi kho subhaddaḥ paribbājako

original: “ajja kira rattiyā pacchime yāme samaṇassa gotamassa parinibbānaṁ bhavissatī”ti.
analyzed: ajja kira rattiyā pacchime yāme samaṇassa gotamassa parinibbānam bhavissati iti

original: Atha kho subhaddassa paribbājakassa etadahosi:
analyzed: atha kho subhaddassa paribbājakassa etat ahosi

original: “sutaṁ kho pana metaṁ paribbājakānaṁ vuḍḍhānaṁ mahallakānaṁ ācariyapācariyānaṁ bhāsamānānaṁ:
analyzed: sutam kho pana metam paribbājakānam vuḍḍhānam mahallakānam ācariya pācariyānam bhāsamānānam

original: ‘kadāci karahaci tathāgatā loke uppajjanti arahanto sammāsambuddhā’ti.
analyzed: kadāci karahaci tathāgatāḥ loke uppajjanti arahantaḥ sammāsambuddhāḥ ati

original: Ajjeva rattiyā pacchime yāme samaṇassa gotamassa parinibbānaṁ bhavissati.
analyzed: ajja iva rattiyā pacchime yāme samaṇassa gotamassa parinibbānam bhavissati

original: Atthi ca me ayaṁ kaṅkhādhammo uppanno,
analyzed: atthi ca me ayam kaṅkhā dhammo uppanno

original: evaṁ pasanno ahaṁ samaṇe gotame, ‘pahoti me samaṇo gotamo tathā dhammaṁ desetuṁ, yathāhaṁ imaṁ kaṅkhādhammaṁ pajaheyyan’”ti.
analyzed: evam pasannaḥ aham samaṇe gotame pahoti me samaṇaḥ gotamaḥ tathā dhammam desetu yathā aham imam kaṅkhā dhammam pajaheyyanti

original: Atha kho subhaddo paribbājako yena upavattanaṁ mallānaṁ sālavanaṁ, yenāyasmā ānando tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṁ ānandaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: atha kho subhaddaḥ paribbājakaḥ yena upavattanam mallānam sālavana yena āyasman ānandaḥ tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantam ānandam etat avoca

original: “sutaṁ metaṁ, bho ānanda, paribbājakānaṁ vuḍḍhānaṁ mahallakānaṁ ācariyapācariyānaṁ bhāsamānānaṁ:
analyzed: sutam mā ita bho ānanda paribbājakānam vuḍḍhānam mahallakānam ācariya pācariyānam bhāsamānānam

original: ‘kadāci karahaci tathāgatā loke uppajjanti arahanto sammāsambuddhā’ti.
analyzed: kadāci karahaci tathāgatāḥ loke uppajjanti arahantaḥ sammāsambuddhāḥ ati

original: Ajjeva rattiyā pacchime yāme samaṇassa gotamassa parinibbānaṁ bhavissati.
analyzed: ajja iva rattiyā pacchime yāme samaṇassa gotamassa parinibbānam bhavissati

original: Atthi ca me ayaṁ kaṅkhādhammo uppanno—
analyzed: atthi ca me ayam kaṅkhā dhammo uppanno

original: evaṁ pasanno ahaṁ samaṇe gotame ‘pahoti me samaṇo gotamo tathā dhammaṁ desetuṁ, yathāhaṁ imaṁ kaṅkhādhammaṁ pajaheyyan’ti.
analyzed: evam pasannaḥ aham samaṇe gotame pahoti me samaṇaḥ gotamaḥ tathā dhammam desetu yathā aham imam kaṅkhā dhammam pajaheyyanti

original: Sādhāhaṁ, bho ānanda, labheyyaṁ samaṇaṁ gotamaṁ dassanāyā”ti.
analyzed: sādhā āha bho ānanda labheyyam samaṇam gotamam dassanāya ati

original: Evaṁ vutte, āyasmā ānando subhaddaṁ paribbājakaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: evam vutte āyasman ānandaḥ subhaddam paribbājakam etat avoca

original: “alaṁ, āvuso subhadda, mā tathāgataṁ viheṭhesi, kilanto bhagavā”ti.
analyzed: ala āvuso subhadda mā tathāgatam viheṭhesi kilantaḥ bhagavā iti

original: Dutiyampi kho subhaddo paribbājako …pe…
analyzed: dutiyam pi kho subhaddaḥ paribbājakaḥ pe

original: “sutaṁ metaṁ, bho ānanda, paribbājakānaṁ vuḍḍhānaṁ mahallakānaṁ ācariyapācariyānaṁ bhāsamānānaṁ:
analyzed: sutam mā ita bho ānanda paribbājakānam vuḍḍhānam mahallakānam ācariya pācariyānam bhāsamānānam

original: ‘kadāci karahaci tathāgatā loke uppajjanti arahanto sammāsambuddhā’ti.
analyzed: kadāci karahaci tathāgatāḥ loke uppajjanti arahantaḥ sammāsambuddhāḥ ati

original: Ajjeva rattiyā pacchime yāme samaṇassa gotamassa parinibbānaṁ bhavissati.
analyzed: ajja iva rattiyā pacchime yāme samaṇassa gotamassa parinibbānam bhavissati

original: Atthi ca me ayaṁ kaṅkhādhammo uppanno—
analyzed: atthi ca me ayam kaṅkhā dhammo uppanno

original: evaṁ pasanno ahaṁ samaṇe gotame, ‘pahoti me samaṇo gotamo tathā dhammaṁ desetuṁ, yathāhaṁ imaṁ kaṅkhādhammaṁ pajaheyyan’ti.
analyzed: evam pasannaḥ aham samaṇe gotame pahoti me samaṇaḥ gotamaḥ tathā dhammam desetu yathā aham imam kaṅkhā dhammam pajaheyyanti

original: Sādhāhaṁ, bho ānanda, labheyyaṁ samaṇaṁ gotamaṁ dassanāyā”ti.
analyzed: sādhā āha bho ānanda labheyyam samaṇam gotamam dassanāya ati

original: Tatiyampi kho āyasmā ānando subhaddaṁ paribbājakaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: tatiyam pi kho āyasmai ānandaḥ subhaddam paribbājakam etat avoca

original: “alaṁ, āvuso subhadda, mā tathāgataṁ viheṭhesi, kilanto bhagavā”ti.
analyzed: ala āvuso subhadda mā tathāgatam viheṭhesi kilantaḥ bhagavā iti

original: Assosi kho bhagavā āyasmato ānandassa subhaddena paribbājakena saddhiṁ imaṁ kathāsallāpaṁ.
analyzed: assosi kho bhagavā āyasmataḥ ānandassa subhaddena paribbājakena saddhim imam kathā sallāpa

original: Atha kho bhagavā āyasmantaṁ ānandaṁ āmantesi:
analyzed: atha khalu bhagavān āyasmantam ānandam āmantesi

original: “alaṁ, ānanda, mā subhaddaṁ vāresi, labhataṁ, ānanda, subhaddo tathāgataṁ dassanāya.

analyzed: mayam bhagavataḥ sarīram dibbehi naccehi gītehi vāditehi mālehi gandhehi sakkarontā
